Su tenacidad y el empeño con el que realiza sus labores, la impulsan a buscar nuevas alternativas que le permitan salir adelante, por ello encuentra en el crédito un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio independiente, con el dinero comprará una máquina fileteadora industrial e insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, entre otros), de esta forma podrá agilizar su trabajo y estará en la capacidad de entregar los pedidos de manera oportuna, abriéndose paso a obtener nuevos contratos que le generen una mayor rentabilidad con la que pueda cumplir su sueño de ser una microempresaria totalmente independiente y dedicarle todo el tiempo a su negocio; de esta forma podrá estar más tiempo con su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
María is a thriving, hardworking woman.  She has been the head of her household since she separated from her ex-husband.

Currently she works as an employee in a dressmaking business, working the 2 p.m. to 10 p.m. shift.  She also has a small workshop located in her home, where she sews for a third party during the morning hours.  She counts on the support of her sister, who has contacts and who oversees production, and of her mother who collaborates on the dressmaking to make sure they get done on time.  In this way, she supplements her income to support her family.

Her persistence and the resolve with which she carries out her job push her to look for new ways of getting ahead.  Because of this, she is taking out a loan to support her in strengthening her independent business.  With the loan money, she will buy an industrial overlock sewing machine and supplies in bulk (fabric, thread, and buttons, among others).  In this way she will be able to speed up her work and deliver her orders in a timely fashion.  This will open up opportunities to make new contracts that will make her business more profitable.  With her profits, she can reach her dream of being a completely independent micro-entrepreneur; she’ll be able to dedicate all her time to her business.  In this way she will be able to spend more time with her family and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy an industrial overlock sewing machine and supplies in bulk (fabric, thread, and buttons, among others).

loans.name: Luis Eduardo

texts.es:
Luis, a sus 68 años de edad,  es todo un guerrero, un hombre luchador y trabajador que no se deja vencer por la edad, pues aún tiene energía y motivación para seguir luchando por el bienestar de su familia. Actualmente se dedica a trabajar como guadañador, prestando sus servicios en las diferentes fincas del municipio donde reside, esta actividad la aprendió de manera empíria y la realiza desde hace 8 años. Además complementa sus ingresos, con la fabricación y comercialización de sandalias de dama, oficio que aprendió de un amigo, reparte el tiempo diariamente para cumplir con ambas actividades, en la mañana trabaja con su guadaña y en las tardes y noches, desde la comodidad de su vivienda, elabora las sandalias en croché, corcho y otros materiales sintéticos, diseños propios que han tenido muy buena acogida entre las mujeres del municipio; de esta forma se gana la vida y le brinda sustento a su esposa y sus dos hijos.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor (hilos, agujas de croché, corcho, sintéticos) y realizará mantenimiento de su guadañadora, esto le permitirá tener la capacidad para elaborar nuevos diseños que satisfagan los gustos de su clientela, además prestará un mejor servicio a los finqueros de la región, mejorando así los ingresos que percibe por su labor.
Luis manifiesta que su avanzada edad no le impide luchar por sus sueños, por ello sigue trabajando para que en un futuro cercano, esté en la capacidad de comprar otra guadañadora y generar empleo, además quiere montar un pequeño almacén en el que pueda exhibir los productos que fabrica, facilitando la venta de los mismos y, con las ganancias que obtenga poder mejorar la calidad de vida familiar.
texts.en:
At 68 years old, Luis is a fighter - a plucky and hard-working man who will not let his age defeat him. He still has energy and the motivation to keep fighting for his family's well-being. He is currently working as a grass cutter, offering his services in the various estates around his town. He learned this work on the job and has now been doing it for eight years. He also earns an income from making and selling women's sandals, a trade he learned from a friend. Luis splits his time between these two jobs, cutting grass in the mornings, and producing sandals from the comfort of his home in the afternoons and evenings. Luis makes the sandals using crochet, and with materials such as cork and synthetic materials. He has his own designs, which have been well-received by local woman. With these jobs, Luis earns a living and supports his wife and two children.

Luis will use this loan to buy supplies (threads, crochet needles, cork, synthetic materials) in bulk and to carry out maintenance on his lawn mower. This will allow him to create new designs which will satisfy his customers' tastes. He can also offer better service to the region's land owns and increase his income from this work.

Luis tells us that his ever-advancing age is not stopping him from fighting for his dreams. He consequently continues to work so that, in the near future, he will be able to buy another lawn mower and provide jobs to others. He also wants to open a small shop to display his sandals. This would make sales easier and Luis would be able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies (threads, crochet needles, cork, synthetic materials) in bulk and to carry out maintenance on his lawn mower.

loans.name: Luis Norberto

texts.es:
Luis es un campesino trabajador y pujante, a sus 58 años de edad, es casado y padre de 4 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante trabajando arduamente para darles sustento y educación.
Durante toda su vida se ha dedicado a las labores del campo, pues posee cultivos de plátano y café, cuyas cosechas recolecta y vende en el mercado del pueblo pero, desde hace 2 meses, con el ánimo de complementar los ingresos, adquirió una tienda de abarrotes en otro municipio, allí ofrece gran variedad de artículos de la canasta familiar, generalmente trabaja solo, pero en algunos días recibe el apoyo de un hijo; de esta forma genera mayor nivel de ingresos para su familia.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de surtido al por mayor (granos, chocolate, galletería, pastas, huevos, azúcar, lácteos, entre otros), esto le permitirá capitalizar su nuevo negocio y podrá satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes, logrando tener mejores ventas e ingresos.
Luis manifiesta que su propósito a futuro es tener su negocio bien acreditado y con gran variedad de surtido, que le garantice una rentabilidad favorable para dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is a hard-working and strong peasant. He is 68 years old, married and a father to four children, whom he has helped to get ahead by working very hard to support and educate them.

Throughout his life Luis has worked in the fields. He has banana and coffee crops, the harvests of which he sells in the local market. Two months ago, however, in order to complement his income, Luis started a grocery shop in another town. There he offers and great variety of staple items. He usually works alone but on some days one of his sons helps out. This work allows Luis to earn a higher income for his family.

Luis will use this loan to buy stock (grains, chocolate, biscuits, pasta, eggs, sugar, dairy products and more) in bulk. This will allow him to make money on his new business and satisfy his customers' needs and tastes. He will have higher sales and a higher income.

Luis tells us that his future plan is to make his business more reputable and to offer a great variety of stock. This will guarantee good profits so that he can provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock (grains, chocolate, biscuits, pasta, eggs, sugar, dairy products and more) in bulk.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: El señor Víctor  tiene 45 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora,  vive en comunidad alejada del pueblo, desde muy pequeño  empezó a trabajar en la agricultura junto con sus padres. A medida que fue pasando el tiempo llego a formar su hogar, se casó y ahora tiene tres hijos que  aún son dependientes  económicamente.  Cada día se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante y mantener a su familia. Por la pobreza que atraviesa tubo que  empezar a trabajar  como jornalero, el  desastre natural de la helada  hizo que sus productos no maduraran bien, este desastre afecto su economía, y no obtuvo los ingresos que él esperaba ya que planeaba tener una cosecha favorable. En el lugar donde vive solo cosechan una sola vez al año no cuentan con riego y tienen que esperar la época de aguacero para sembrar sus productos. Actualmente solicita un  crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas (semillas y abono), y así aumentar su producción ya que quedo sin nada de capital, de esta manera lograra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Victor is 45 years old. He is a hard-working person. He lives in a community far from town. Since he was little, he began to work in agriculture along with his parents. As time passed, he built his home. He married and now has three children who are still dependents economically. Each day he works hard to get ahead and support his family. Due to poverty, he had to start working as a laborer. The frost natrual disaster meant that his products did not grow well. This disaster affected his income and he did not get the income he hoped for since he had planned to have a favorable harvest. Where he lives they only harvest once a year and it is not irrigated and then have to  hope for a rainy season to plant their products. Currently, he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural resources (seeds and fertilizer) and therefore increase his production since he has not been left with any capital. In this way, he can improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming resources (seeds and fertilizer).

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en el sector Lishinas una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se caracteriza por su clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura y comercio, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región de Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, Cesar ha solicitado un préstamo de 600 nuevo soles para el mantenimiento de su vehículo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar, 44, lives with his wife in Lishinas, a rural area in the district of Pucará, a community known for its hot climate. Its people work in agriculture and business. It’s located two hours from the city of Jaén which belongs to the Region of Cajamarca, the northern highlands of Peru.

He provides public transportation on his own motorcycle taxi taking his customers to small villages surrounding his district. 

Cesar has requested a loan for 600 Peruvian Nuevo Soles to maintain his vehicle so that he can generate a higher income for his family.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle to continue providing service.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 58 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in the southern part of Albania. He and his wife practice agriculture as their main source of income.  They focus their interest on wheat, fodder, corn, and red beets. They also have apple and pear orchards.

Ali is requesting a loan from VisionFund Albania for 200,000 Albanian leks, which he will use to invest in a tractor to plow the field he uses it for planting and also to offer service to others in the village.

loans.use: to invest in a tractor

loans.name: İlgar

texts.en:
İlgar is a taxi driver. He is 40 years old and single. Ilgar lives with his parents. His father was sick for many years and Ilgar provides for all the needs of the family. Ilgar’s mother is a housewife and she does not work on incoming business. They live in the Baku region. 

It’s noted that Ilgar is a taxi driver and now he needs a loan, in the amount of AZN 1,000 (Azerbaijan New Manat), to buy snow tires for his car. Therefore, he applied to Komak Credit Union. 

In the future, Ilgar wants to change his car and, in his personal life, he wants to get married and have children. He is very thankful to the Kiva organization and to lenders for aid.

loans.use: to buy snow tires for his taxi.

loans.name: Rda

texts.en:
Rda is a married 25-year-old Iraqi youth who owns a small shop for selling mobile phones and their accessories. He offers to sell mobile phones with affordable and competitive prices and he provides all the needed mobile phone accessories for his clients.

He established his business in 2006 and now he has hired an employee. He is gradually gaining experience and he is gaining a good reputation in the neighborhood. Rda is requesting a youth loan of $1,500 to renovate his shop by installing new shelves on the walls and by installing new blocks on the floor. 

He aims to grow his business and increase his revenues so that he may provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to renovate his shop by installing new shelves on the walls and by installing new blocks on the floor

loans.name: Chin

texts.en:
Chin is 51 years old and a resident of a remote area of Bakan district, Pursat province. She is a farmer planting rice on two hectare of farmland and selling it in the local market. Her business is in a good location, so she is able to grow rice twice a year and is aiming to continue developing her business in order to achieve her goal and satisfy her family’s necessities. 

Chin would like to improve the sanitation practice and help her family members live in hygienic conditions. She is requesting a loan from Hattha Kaksekar Limited's water loan program for $1,000, which she will use to build a safe latrine for use at home. Chin is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a safe latrine for use at home.

loans.name: Angie Lorena

texts.es:
Ella es  una niña que a los 4 años ingreso al jardín,  allí le enseñaron cosas básicas de la vida como las vocales,  números y valores etc.
El siguiente año emprendío un nuevo y lindo mundo que es el del colegio, en el aprendío que era el segundo  hogar,  donde encuentra amigos que son como los hermanos y personas que hacen que los días sean mas felices,  tuvo un excelente aprendizaje y ahora que ha culminado los estudios quiere estudiar auxiliar en enfermería porque es una carrera que le gusta, ademas es una noble profesión y puede satisfacer las necesidades de ayudar al prójimo y asi ser útil para la sociedad.
Ya que no cuenta con los suficientes recursos, solicita el convenio con kiva, que es como un auxilio para cumplir lass metas y sueños que tiene.
texts.en:
She is a girl, who at 4 years old, entered kindergarten. There she was taught basic things like vowels, numbers, values etc... The following year she started a new and beautiful world of elementary school in which she learned it was her second home where she found friends who were like her siblings and people who made her days happier.

She had an excellent learning experience and now she wants to study nursing because it’s a career she likes. In addition it’s a noble profession and it can satisfy the necessity of helping people and in turn be useful to society.

She is requesting a loan from Kiva, as she doesn’t have the sufficient resources, which will help her to fulfil her goals and dreams.

loans.use: to pay tuition for a semester.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz ha sido una mujer dedicada a su esposo y sus 5 hijos, a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo.
Desde hace 1 año inició su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes en la que ofrece todo tipo de víveres, mecato y licor, la idea surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y solventar los gastos de su numerosa familia.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de surtido al por mayor (mecato, granos, lácteos, carnes frías, galletería, entre otros), pues su propósito es ir acreditando su negocio y tener la variedad de productos que su clientela le solicita, para satisfacer los diversos gustos y necesidades; esto le permitirá mejorar las ventas y los ingresos para su familia.
Luz, a sus 46 años de edad se proyecta hacia el futuro, acreditando bien su negocio para que le genere una rentabilidad que garantice una estabilidad económica para ofrecer mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz has been a woman dedicated to her husband and five children, whom she has gotten ahead with great effort.

One year ago she began her own business: a grocery store where she offers every type of provision, pastries, and liquor.  This idea came out of a need to get an income to support her husband with the financial needs of the home and to cover the expenses of her large family.

She will invest the loan she has requested in the purchase of stock in bulk (pastries, grains, dairy products, cold cuts, and cookies, among others).  Her goal is to keep proving her business and having the wide variety of products that her clientele ask for.  This is to meet their diverse tastes and needs; this will allow her to improve her sales and income for her family.

At 46 years old, Luz is planning for the future, confirming her business so that it is profitable.  This will guarantee financial stability in order to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in bulk (pastries, grains, dairy products, cold cuts, and cookies, among others)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase supplies in bulk (various fruits) and perform maintenance work on her machines.

loans.name: Michel

texts.fr:
Monsieur Michel, est enseignant de profession où il a exercé pendant 11 ans. Il a arrêté et travaille maintenant pour son propre compte depuis 2010. Son activité consiste à la fabrication de filtre à eau, c’est d’ailleurs la raison de sa demande de crédit. Un crédit qui va lui permettre d’acheter le matériel nécessaire pour la confection des filtres à eau. Il travaille de 6h du matin à 23h du soir.
Michel est marié et père de 6 enfants dont le plus âgé est une fille de 13 ans. En dehors de la dépense quotidienne, il s’occupe aussi de la location, de l’électricité et de l’eau.
Michel veut acquérir un terrain dans un futur proche et aider ses enfants à réussir dans la vie.
texts.en:
Michel was a teacher for 11 years. But now he has his own business, which he started in 2010, where he makes water filters. It is for this reason that he is seeking a loan. A loan will allow him to buy the necessary materials to make his water filters. 

He works from 6 a.m. to 11 p.m.

Michel is married and a father of six children, of whom the eldest is a 13-year-old girl. In addition to the everyday expenses, he must also take care of the rent, electricity, and water.

Michel wants to acquire some land in the near future and help his children succeed in their lives.

loans.use: to buy buckets and the necessary materials for making water filters to resell

loans.name: Varuzhan

texts.en:
Varuzhan lives in the village of Khachardzan in Tavush region. He is married and he has five children: three sons and two daughters. His two sons and two daughters are already students and the smallest son is still primary school-aged. This big and nice family’s main income comes from farming; in his farm Varudzan has four calves, a cow and twenty chickens. His wife greatly helps him in farming. 

Varuzhan has a   small woodworking shop and he makes doors, windows, tables, chairs and boxes for beehives all to order. At the same time he works as a sentry at the school. So as a father of a big family, Varuzhan works day and night, in order to provide his large family with minimal living conditions.

Varuzhan is asking for a loan of 900,000 Armenian drams in order to buy several calves and animal fodder, so as to make his farm richer with hope of having more income from it.

loans.use: to buy several calves and animal fodder

loans.name: Ogsen

texts.en:
Ogsen is 28 years old and he lives in Stepanvan city in Lori region. He is not married; he lives with his retired mother. His father died several years ago. 

Ogsen worked as a contractual military serviceman, but now he works at a gas station as a locksmith. Ogsen also has two brothers, who are married and  live in the Russian Federation with their families. As Ogsen says, he and his mother greatly miss them and their children and to speak with them by phone is very expensive. 

Ogsen greatly wants to provide his mother with good living condition and comfort. He is asking for a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a washing machine for his mother and he also wants to buy a computer in order to be able to speak with his brothers’ families by Skype.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for his mother and a computer in order to be able to speak with his brothers’ families by Skype

loans.name: Sergey

texts.en:
Sergey is 28 years old and he lives with his family in Stepanavan city in Lori region. Sergey is married and he has a small son. Since 2007 Sergey has served as a platoon commander. He is a very patriotic person and he teaches his soldiers to be devoted to their motherland and to their religion. He has received this rank thanks to his responsibility and love for his homeland. As Sergey says, the money that he earns is enough for their living, but his savings are too little for the surprise that he wants to make for his beloved wife.

He is asking for a loan of 250,000 Armenian drams, which together with his savings will be the amount which he needs in order to buy kitchen furniture and some electrical equipment for their house.

loans.use: to buy kitchen furniture and some electrical equipment for their house

loans.name: Nurmahmoy

texts.en:
Since 2010, Nurmahmoy has been busy with growing maize, cotton and other crops. He lives with his wife and six children in the southern part of Tajikistan. He has his own land. Nurmahmoy works with his wife. They work hard because they need to have money for providing six children with all necessary things. 

He is asking for a loan of 14,000 somoni because he must buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. This is his second loan from IMON. 

Nurmahmoy is kind man and has a good credit history

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es:
María Angélica tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Lagunas, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, frutas entre otros en el mercado de la zona, tiene una familia unida, su esposo le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de diversas variedades de verduras y frutas para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Angélica, 43, lives with her husband in the district of Lagunas, a community that works in agriculture, business and cattle breeding. It’s located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells vegetables, fruits amongst other items in the local market. She has a close-knit family; her husband helps her with this work. 

She is requesting a loan of 1,000 Peruvian Nuevo Soles for the purchase of a variety of vegetables and fruits to offer her clients and this way generate better revenue for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard, 35 years old, is from Nakuru. He is married to Deborah, who is a housewife, and they are blessed with one child, age 6.

He has been operating his business of motorcycle transport for the last eight years. To enable him to buy another motorcycle for profit maximization, he has applied for his third loan of KES 105,600 from VisionFund Kenya.

Right now, his monthly income is KES 15,000, and he has plans of using profits anticipated from his expanded business to educate his child, pay back his loan to VisionFund Kenya and buy another motorcycle. In the future, Leonard hopes to buy a rickshaw.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a hardworking woman with four children. She lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her main businesses are growing crops and buying and selling produce, which she has been doing for three years. She started this business with a vision of increasing her income. She faces the challenge of limited capital.

Agnes is requesting another loan, which she will use to buy produce to sell. She intends to educate her children to higher levels of learning.

loans.use: to purchase produce to sell

loans.name: Kafah

texts.en:
Kafah is a married client from Iraq. He is 34 years old and has two children. Kafah works to provide his family income and pay the tuition fees of his child. 

Kafah is a baker. He owns a small bakery and specializes in making pastries and bread. He established his business in 2013 and has gained his experience in this field through previously working as an employee at a baker for several years. He now has two employees and has a good reputation in his surrounding area thanks to the special flavor of his dough.

Kafah is requesting a loan of $2,400 to renovate his bakery. He hopes to grow his business and increase his profits so that he is able to take care of his family and continue to provide the tuition fees for his child.

loans.use: to renovate his bakery.

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra is 45 years old, married, and has children. She is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She owns a small garments firm with three machines; she offers work in her factory to women in her area. She has lot of work pending for completion but she does not have enough employees and sewing machines.

To help her continue the operations of her business, Bushra requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which she will use to buy an additional sewing machine and packs of zippers and buttons to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to pay for personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for sewing garments.

loans.name: Jarvin Ariel

texts.es: Jarvin vive en  la comunidad el sardinal tiene 25 años, por problemas económicos en su familia no pudo continuar estudiando y de la edad de 15 años tuvo que aprender a realizar labores del campo,  con mucho esfuerzo logro obtener su propio terreno para realizar la siembra de sus cultivos de café y así fue que se hizo de su propia casa, en estos momentos vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, viendo que el candil es dañino para la salud y es con lo único que se iluminan  en  su casa ya que hacer usos de candelas o phocos con baterias es mas caro. es por  esa razón que solicita un crédito para la compra de un panel solar y así poderle brindar una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Jarvin lives in the community of Sardinal. He is 25 years old and for financial problems in his family he couldn’t continue studying. At the age of 15 he had to work and with much effort he managed to obtain his own land to cultivate his coffee crops and this is how he built his own house. At the moment he lives with his wife and their two children. 

Seeing that oil lamps are dangerous for one’s health and it’s the only thing that is used for light in his house, because candles and flash lights are expensive, he is requesting a loan to purchase a solar panel and therefore provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a lighting system.

loans.name: Sofian Group

texts.en:
Sofian Group is a four-member group of women from Taiz, Yemen. They have asked for a YER 150,000 group loan from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank (AMB).

Ashwaq, the leader of the group, is a 36-year-old married woman with children. She is uneducated and doing her best to raise her children, as well as educating them.

Her house is very old and needs some basic renovations in order to build two rooms. She applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB.

She wants to buy bricks and cement to complete the building of her two extra rooms. She hopes that, after the completion of the building, she will feel safe in her house with her family.

loans.use: to buy bricks and cement to complete the building of her two extra rooms.

loans.name: Emma

texts.es:
Emma es una joven  de 26 años de edad, madre soltera de una niña de 9 años de edad, quien estudia en el centro escolar de la comunidad el tercer grado del nivel básico, vive con sus padres.
Emma estudio hasta el bachillerato en la ciudad que está a 6 km de donde reside, desde que tiene su hija trabaja cada día para ayudar a la familia.
Trabaja en la comercialización de productos de lencería y una pequeña joyería, tiene ya dos años de dedicarse a eso, aprendió gracias a su hermana mayor que le enseño el negocio y desde entonces tiene su propio negocio. Vende los productos en la comunidad donde reside y en las zonas aledañas, compra los productos en la ciudad lo hace acompañada de su hermana mayor, que ya tiene más experiencia en el rubro.
Por las tardes también ayuda a su hermana y a su madre a hacer pupusas las cuales venden en la comunidad.
Solicita un crédito en credicampo, para comprar más productos de lencería (lociones, aritos, pulseras y otros productos) para tener más variedades de ofertas a los clientes que posee y asi expandirse poco a poco a más lugares.
Sueña con darle la educación necesaria a su hija, quien ya está estudiando y así que logre desarrollarse profesionalmente, con el préstamo Enma tendrá oportunidades de vender mas productos y obtener mayores ingresos económicos que le permitan darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija y a su familia.
Espera en el futuro crecer más con el comercio de los productos de lencería y su joyería, invirtiendo más para lograr más ingresos y en el futuro si Dios permite hacer su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Emma is is a 26 year old, single mother of a nine year old daughter who is in third grade at the local school.  They live with her parents.  Emma attended school through high school in a city that is 6 km from her home.  Since having her daughter, she has worked everyday to help her family.  She works selling lingerie and in a small jewelry store.  She has worked in this for two years.  She learned the business from her older sister, and since then has had her own business.  She sells her products in the community that she lives in and in surrounding areas.  She purchases the products in the city with her older sister since she has more experience in the industry.  In the afternoons, she also helps her sister and her mother make pupusas that they sell in the community.

She is seeking a loan with credicampo to purchase more lingerie, lotions, earrings, bracelets and other products in order to offer a better variety to her customers, and expand to more places, little by little.  She dreams of providing her daughter with a education so that she can develop professionally.  With the loan, Emma will have opportunities to sell more products and generate greater earnings, allowing her to give her daughter and her family a better quality of life.  In the future, she hopes to grow in her lingerie and jewelry business, investing more in order to get greater returns, and in the future, God-willing, have her own home.

loans.use: purchase more lingerie, lotions, earrings, bracelets and other products to offer a greater variety.

loans.name: Zafarjon

texts.en:
Zafarjon was born in 1983. He is a kind and ambitious man. Zafarjon is married and has a little child who is one year old. Zafarjon lives with his family in the south part of Tajikistan. He is the main provider of his family. 

Zafarjon works hard to earn a living. Zafarjon is a master of repairing cars. He has his workshop near his house. He knows his business very well. He has worked in this field for more than a year. Zafarjon learnt this business from his father. Little by little, he attracts clients. 

He is going to repair his house as it is in bad condition. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS to buy building materials such as cement, paints, wood, etc. for repairing the house. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, paints, wood, etc. for repairing the house.

loans.name: Faek

texts.en:
Faek, 30 years old, is an Iraqi youth client who is married and has two children. Faek is the sole provider for the family.
 
Faek owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2007 and now has a hired employee. Faek has built up good experience in this field. He has an excellent reputation and is becoming well known in the surrounding area. 

Faek is requesting a youth loan of $1,500 in order to pay the annual rent for his grocery store. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his grocery store

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es: El señor José es una persona muy trabajadora, curso solamente hasta la primaria ya que por falta de recursos económicos no pudo continuar con sus estudios superiores y empezó a trabajar a muy temprana edad. Es de estado civil soltero pero convive más de 10 años con su conyugue con la que tiene dos hijos pequeños, que aún dependen de él. Tiene gran experiencia en el rubro de la construcción civil ya que lleva más de 10 años en esta actividad; junto a su familia vive en la casa de su suegro, y actualmente solicita un crédito para refaccionar el techo de la vivienda que habita ya que se encuentra muy deteriorada y el quiere brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José is a very hardworking person. He left school after primary school because he lacked economic resources. He could not continue with his studies so he began working at a young age. He is single but he has lived with his partner for more than 10 years. They have two young children who depend on him.

He has a lot of experience in the civil construction industry, since he has been working in this are for more than 10 years. He lives with his family in his father-in-law's house.

He requests this loan to re-build the roof of their home because it is very deteriorated and he wants to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: re-build the roof on the home where he lives.

loans.name: Yudy Elena

texts.es:
Yudy es una mujer pujante y trabajadora, a sus 35 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos, por quienes lucha incansablemente.
Actualmente se dedica a la confección, prestando el servicio a terceros; el oficio lo aprendió en un curso de capacitación que recibió, luego obtuvo experiencia y aumentó sus conocimientos mientras trabajaba como operaria en una empresa de confección, donde estuvo por 4 años; luego tomó la iniciativa de independizarse, pues tenía la necesidad de estar más tiempo con sus hijos y mejorar los ingresos familiares; por ello montó su propio taller en el que trabaja de lunes a sábado de 8 am a 6 pm, de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de una motocicleta, con la que podrá agilizar el transporte de la producción, pues los clientes no van al sector por los frecuentes conflictos que se presentan entre las bandas criminales que existen, por lo que ella debe encargarse del transporte, con el fin de no perder los contratos con los clientes.
Yudy manifiesta que, a pesar de los diferentes desafíos que se presentan, ella seguirá luchando por cumplir sus metas, especialmente tener un taller más grande y ubicado en una zona más tranquila, donde pueda ofrecer oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de hogar y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y aportar para que otras personas también disfruten un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Yudy,35, is an energetic and hard-working woman. She is married and has 3 children whom she strives tirelessly for. She currently makes a living from sewing, supplying third parties. She learnt the trade from a training course which she received and she then gained experience and increased her knowledge whilst working as a machine operator in a sewing company, where she worked for 4 years. After this she took the initiative to branch out on her own as she needed to spend more time with her children and improve the family's income. This led her to set up her own workshop where she works from Monday to Saturday from 8am to 6pm. By doing this she generates enough income to help her husband with the financial responsibility for the household. 

The loan requested will be used to buy a motorbike, which will make it easier for her to transport her finished products. Her customers don't travel to the area where she lives because of the frequent conflicts which occur between the various criminal gangs there. This means she has to transport the items herself, so she doesn't lose the customer contracts.

Yudy says that in spite of the various challenges she faces, she will continue to strive towards fulfilling her goals. In particular she wants to have a bigger workshop in a quieter area, where she can offer employment opportunities to mothers who are head of the household. Thus she will improve her family's quality of life and make a contribution towards better wellbeing for other people too.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for transporting her finished products.

loans.name: Kasem

texts.en:
Kasem is a married client from Iraq. He is 54 years old and has four children. Kasem, along with two of his children, provide the family income.
 
Kasem owns a bakery and provides his neighborhood with bread. He has been practicing this business since 2010 and has gained a lot of experience in this field. Now, Kasem has three employees. Thanks to the good quality of his goods for sale, Kasem has gained a good reputation and the respect of the surrounding area.
 
Kasem is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to pay the annual rent of his bakery. This way, he will be able to continue providing his family’s needs for another year and hope to grow of his business.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his bakery.

loans.name: Tahreer

texts.en:
Tahreer is 33 years old, married, and has five children. She lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa. Her husband is a bus driver. Tahreer has been trying her best to support her husband financially and to provide their children with the best education by running her project of selling clothes, specially pajamas, at her house. She has been doing this for two years. 

Tahreer needs to expand her business and is requesting another loan, which she will use to buy a larger quantity of clothes and adding variety to them in order to attract more customers and to raise her profit.

loans.use: to purchase clothes

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is 30 years old. She is married and lives in a sector in Jordan called Madaba with her husband, three sons and one daughter. Her husband has a coffee kiosk. 

Suzan has been trying her best to support her husband financially to provide their children with the best education. For the past year, she has been running her project of selling clothes at her house. She needs to expand it more now by buying a larger quantity of clothes and add variety to them in order to attract more customers and to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for her business.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is 51 years old and has six children. One of her sons has been working as a blacksmith for seven years and helps provide financial support to his family. He also sells glass. 

Fozia is requesting a loan, which she will use to help her son to start his own business by purchasing new tools and glass cutters. Fozia is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to take her place in the picture.

loans.use: to help her son purchase new  tools for his business

loans.name: Gildo Sarvelio

texts.es:
Gildo, es padre de cuatro hijos todos trabajan, él estudio hasta bachillerato es casado su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

El cliente trabaja la tierra desde los 15 años de edad,  antes en su juventud fue empleado, pero ahora que tiene mayor edad se dedica a la agricultura.

El cliente necesita el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes,  ya que quiere estar preparado para trabajar al caer las primeras lluvias.

A Gildo le gustaría que sus hijos estudien en la universidad, su sueño también es poder dejarle un patrimonio a sus hijos para que tengan donde vivir en lo propio.
texts.en:
Gildo is a father of four working children.  He attended school until high school.  He married, and his spouse performs housework.  Since the age of 15, he has worked the land.  In his youth, he was a gardener, but not as an adult, he works in agriculture.

The client is in need of a loan to purchase manure and fertilizer as he is getting ready to work when the first rains fall.  Gildo would like for his children to get a college education.  His dream is to also be able to leave his children with an inheritance so they will have where to live.

loans.use: purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Eliverta

texts.en:
Eliverta is a 43-year-old mother who has been selling fresh produce from her own agriculture activity for the past sixteen years.  She sells mostly onions and potatoes at a local farmers’ market.  She also sells approximately fifty kg/day of raw milk from their two cows to a nearby dairy farm. 

Eliverta lives in a region that frequently experiences extreme long, cold and snowy winters. She wants to buy onion seeds for planting. 

Eliverta said, “Selling milk, dried red onions and potatoes has been our only source of income for very long time now and we have been dedicated to it 100%. There are times though, that we do not sell all our onions due to having a large quantity, but that’s how it is for most of the farmers. Sometimes you lose.”

loans.use: to buy onion seeds for planting

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy milk, batteries, etc. in large quantity to add to her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a large quantity of fish to add to her business.

loans.name: Kamaridin

texts.en:
Kamaridin is a kind man. He is married and has five children. His wife is a sewer. 

Kamaridin has been busy with a taxi service for more than two years. He drives a taxi line, from his region to another region, which is located to the west of his region. Kamaridin has his regular clients. His business makes him glad. Before it, he was in Russia as a migrant and he had a very difficult life. Little by little, he develops his business. 

Kamaridin wants to buy a new car for his taxi business. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a new car for his taxi business.

loans.name: Lesbia Escorcia

texts.es: Doña, lesbia es una señora que como muchos nicaragüenses se dedica a la venta de ropa en su  hogar y también va a dejar encargos de casa en casa, es soltera, sola busca la manera de salir adelante con este pequeño negocio que es su único sustento de vida. Solicita el crédito con el objetivo de invertir en más ropa nueva y un cajón de juguetes aprovechando la temporada navideña, ya que estos se venden mucho, agradece mucho la facilidad de crédito con lo que invierte en su negocio pagando en cuotas pequeñas, de esta manera es que ella puede  hacer crecer poco a poco sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Like many Nicaraguans, Lesbia sells clothes at her house.  She also delivers orders door to door.  She is single, and she is only looking for the way to get ahead with this small business.  It is her only life support.

She is requesting the loan to buy more new clothes and a case of toys.  She will be taking advantage of the Christmas season because these items are sold a lot.  She is very grateful for the ease of the loan, which she will invest in her business in small payments.  This way she will be able to make her income grow little by little.

loans.use: to buy varied new clothing and a case of toys to sell.

loans.name: Bellita

texts.en:
Bellita is 58 years old, widowed, and has five children. She is a farmer in Kangundo town where she plants cash crops to sell, which she has been doing for 10 years. She earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES.

Bellita is requesting her third loan from VisionFund Kenya, which she will use to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer and seeds for planting in her farm. She will also buy some domestic goods and finish the construction of her house. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children. In the future, Bellita hopes to give her children the best education and also install electricity in her home.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies.

loans.name: Yeprem

texts.en:
Yeprem is 55 years old and he lives in the city of Kapan in Syunik region. Yeprem studied at the Kapan Mountain College to become an electrician. For several years he worked as a construction electrician, then he worked at the school as a teacher of drawing. Now he again works as an electrician. 

Yeprem’s wife died two years ago. Since then, Yeprem has been responsible for the care of their four children. His two daughters are already students at the Yerevan State Medical University. His elder daughter lives with her aunt, who is alone, and she visits her father very often. Yeprem’s son is 28 years old and has a fiancee; they decided to get married and to organize a small, nice wedding party.

Yeprem is asking for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams, which together with his savings will help him to cover the expenses of his son’s wedding party.

loans.use: to pay the expenses of his son’s wedding party

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 25 years old and single. He lives with his widowed mother and his sister. Ahmad takes care of his family’s needs and is its sole support. Ahmad owns a carpenter’s shop, specializing in making furniture, which he has been doing since 2008. Through practice he gained much experience in this field. He is well-known in his neighborhood thanks to his competitive and affordable prices. 

Ahmad is requesting a youth loan for $2,400, which he will use to pay the annual rent of his carpentry shop. He hopes to expand in his field and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with a better living standard.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his carpentry shop

loans.name: Miguel Àngel

texts.es:
Miguel de 31 años de edad,  es una persona que solo estudio hasta educación media y es casado; su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.  Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa e hijos que van a la escuela,  quienes dependen de las actividades que él realiza.

Miguel  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 5 Km.  y trabaja durante toda la mañana, mientras  su esposa durante la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde él cuida los animales en los potreros que alquila.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar dos vaca lecheras y producir mas leche para la venta.

 Miguel planea comprar un terreno, para tener sus animales, ya que alquila lo que le genera mas gastos y disminuye los ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel, age 31, only has a middle school education.  He is married, and his wife devotes herself to the domestic chores.  He gets up at 4:00 a.m. together with his wife and children, who go to school.  They are dependent upon his business activities.

Miguel is a farmer, a trade he learned from his parents.  In order to get to his land, he walks five kilometers.  He works all morning while his wife milks the cows and sells the milk.  Then, in the afternoon he cares for the animals in the pastures that he rents.

The loan he is requesting is to buy two dairy cows in order to produce more milk to sell.

Migual plans to buy a piece of land for his animals.  He now rents, which generates more expenses and decreases the income for his family’s support.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows in order to produce more milk to sell.

loans.name: Ana Silveria

texts.es:
Ana de 47 años de edad, es casada tiene ocho hijos, de los cuales solo 3 viven con ella, ya que los demás decidieron casarse y separarse de ella, sus hijos menores estudian van a sexto grado y a octavo grado, ellos dependen de ella directamente; su esposo trabaja en el campo, pero además trabaja en la construcción como ayudante de albañil y ella se dedica a cuidar a sus últimos hijos y a los quehaceres del hogar, además tiene un molino de mixtamal, el cual le provee de algunos ingresos.

Ella tiene experiencia en el negocio de productos básicos, como lo es el frijol, maíz y maicillo, también trabaja con su molino el cual está en funcionamiento todos los días, ella decido dedicarse a esa actividad, ya que no había un molino cerca de su casa y del vecindario.

El financiamiento lo necesita, para darle mantenimiento a su molino, ya que está un poco mal por el tiempo de uso, también para seguir cultivando su cereales lo cuales son  maíz, frijol y maicillo con esos productos seguirá trabajando fuertemente, ya que necesita mejorar su estado de vida y de su familia

Sus sueños son ver bien a sus hijos en el sentido que cada uno tenga su casita donde vivir, aunque sea sencillo que tengan un buen trabajito que les ayude con el sustento diario de su familia, también quiere cambiar su molino por uno nuevo, ya que este le falla por ratos pero hay va siempre trabajando con alegría y entusiasmo aunque a veces hay tropiezos. Con las ganancias de los productos quiere tener un buen negocio de cereales que le ayuden a una mejor vida familiar.
texts.en:
Ana is 47 years old, is married, and has eight children,of whom three live with her.  The rest decided to get married and separate themselves from her.  Her younger children are in school and are in sixth and eight grade; they depend on her directly.  Her husband works in the field, but he also works in construction as a mason's assistant.  She dedicates her time to raising her children and taking care of their home.  She also has a mixtamal mill, which provides some income for her.  She has experience in the basic grain business like beans, corn and sorghum.  She also works with her mill, which runs every day.  She decided to work in this field because there was a mill near her home.

She needs the loan to perform maintenance work on her mill as it is in poor condition from being used.  The loan will also be used to continue cultivating her grains which are corn, beans and sorghum.  With these products, she will continue to work hard because she needs to improve her and her family's living condition.  Her dreams are for her kids to be well and each have their own home to live in, even if it is simple, and that they all have a good job that helps them provide for their families.  She also wants to exchange her mill for a new one because the one she has now stops working at times, but nevertheless, she continues to work happily and enthusiastically even with the challenges.  With the earnings from her products, she wants to have a grain business that helps improve her family's condition.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her mill and continue to cultivate her grains which are corn, beans and sorghum

loans.name: Kim Group

texts.en:
Lhingneichong believes in endurance and patience. Sustaining a family with a meager source of income is undeniably difficult for everyone, but it is harder for Lhingneichong, whose work site is about 5 kms away from the village. She walks at the break of the dawn to collect charcoal and comes back the same 5 kms route to the village and boards a mini truck with the charcoal at the top of the mini truck to the town market to sell it. She is the featured borrower member for Lily Lom and she is pictured with her hand raised.

The group comprises five hardworking women who all reside in a village that is about 15 kms far from the town. The town is 62 kms from the capital town of Imphal. The group members usually contribute equal shares and take land from the village chief on rent for a period of one year so that they can cut down firewood and burn it for charcoal. When the charcoal is ready to be sold, she walks everyday at the break of the dawn to collect the charcoal from the burial sites and carries the charcoal sack on her back and walks back to the village. Only once or twice do vehicles ply that route. If one gets lucky, then one gets a ride or else walking is the only option. From the village, she travels to the town market with the charcoal and sells it.
	
With the KIva loan, she will contribute a share for taking the land on rent and start burning charcoal. She is sure to earn a good amount of money since charcoal is in great demand during winter season and the price also is high unlike in off seasons. She says she will also be able to pay new admissions for the children without worrying where to get the money as she could sell her charcoal like hot cakes in this season. 

Her dream is to purchase a used mini truck so that it can be used as a carrier for charcoal and also as a passenger carrier. She thanked Kiva and hopes it will continue cooperation with WSDS and make their lives happy ones.  She is also glad for the support and believes that this may bring a success in life. She says, “Thank you, Kiva.”

The rest of the group members are also engaged in charcoal business.

loans.use: To purchase a portion of land on rent, cut woods and burn charcoal for selling to support the family and kids education

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 30-year-old married man from a small village near Jenin city. He is a father with three young kids; two sons and one daughter. Mohammad is a construction worker with a seasonal income. He had a work accident and he hurt his hand. He can't do his work before undergoing surgery and massages. 

Mohammad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to have urgent surgery for his hand and also massages. By taking out this loan, Mohammad will be able to treat his hand and get back to work. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to have an urgent surgery for his hand and also massage.

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.en:
Sharofat was born in 1973. She is a hardworking woman from a rural area of South Tajikistan. She is married and has a child. She has a higher pedagogical degree. She works in a local school as a teacher of math. She has worked for many years. She has a small salary and it is not enough for improving living condition. 

Sharofat is going to repair her house because her house is in bad condition. She is asking for a loan of 3500 Somoni to buy building materials such as cement, paint, etc. for repairing her house. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, paint, etc. for repairing house

loans.name: Phillis

texts.en:
Phillis is 44 years old, comes from Naivasha, and is married. They have six children who are aged between 21 years and four years old.

Phillis has a livestock business as well as doing poultry-keeping and she has been in this business for many years with a good income. She has applied for her first loan of KES. 30,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to enable her to buy more chicks to add to her flock. 

She hopes to expand her businesses in the near future and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy chicks

loans.name: Rasheedan

texts.en:
Rasheedan is 58 years old, married, and has children. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. Her son is a very hardworking and honest young person. He is involved in his own business and provides a regular income for the family. He is manufacturing and selling furniture, such as single beds, tables, etc. He started this business from a young age and is very experienced. Rasheedan's son has many regular customers and he takes orders for making or repairing wooden accessories. This business yields a good income for her son, but her family's needs are increasing day by day and she needs more money to afford household expenses. 

Rasheedan is requesting a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which she will use to buy more raw materials for her son for making furniture in order to expand the business. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial and productive for his business as well as for his family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making furniture

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano de 55 años de edad, es casado tiene tres hijos, su grado de estudio es muy bajo, ya que antes no pudo estudiar como hubiera querido, vive junto a su esposa la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar solo ella depende de él, ya que sus hijos viven en otro lugar ya que se fueron a estudiar y a trabajar para ser alguien diferente en la vida.

Mariano se dedica al cuido de vacas y terneros, se dedica a esa actividad hace más de 20 años, ya que su padre se dedicaba también a esa actividad, además se dedica al cultivo de frijol, maíz y maicillo, camina unos treinta minutos a su lugar de trabajo, ya que no está muy lejos donde tiene sus cultivos.

El financiamiento lo necesita, para seguir trabajando la tierra y para comprar una novilla, la cual cuidara para que el futuro le provea leche y otro ternero y seguir ampliando su crianza de animales, eso le ayudara a que su estado de vida cambie, ya que tendrá mas capital para seguir trabajando y vivir junto a su esposa de mejor manera.

Él planea que sus sueños sean llegar a poseer bastante ganado, ya que si sus ganancias aumentan podría construir de nuevo su casa, ya que donde vive es de bahareque y esta bastante deteriorada por lo que necesita el impulso económico para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
Mariano is 55 yeas old, he is married and has three children.  He has very little education because he was not able to attend school as he would have wanted.  He lives with his wife who dedicates her time to house work.  She is the only one that depends on him as his children live elsewhere because they went to attend school and work to be build different lives for themselves.  Mariano works taking care of cows and calves.  He was worked in this field for over 20 years since his father also worked in this field.  He also grows beans, corn and sorghum.  He walks about 30 minutes to get to work because he does not live farm from where he has his crops.  

He needs this loan to continue to work the land and purchase a heifer that he will take care of so that in the future it can provide milk and another calf, so he may expand his animal breeding.  This will help change his living conditions because he will have more capital to continue working and living with her wife in a better fashion.  His dream is to have a lot of cattle because if his earnings increase he will be able to build a new house since where he lives now is made of adobe and is very deteriorated.  He needs this financial boost to reach his goals.

loans.use: continue to work the land and purchase a heifer.

loans.name: Yan

texts.en:
Yan is married with seven children and lives with her family in a remote area in Pursat province. She helps her husband in managing their farm, growing and harvesting rice to make a living. She has more than one and a half hectares of farmland, on which she grows rice twice a year. She has been in this occupation for nearly 35 years and earns well for the family. 

As of now, she is asking for a loan in the sum of USD 500 to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of her children for sanitation improvement. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Yan is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of her children for sanitation improvement.

loans.name: Savoeun

texts.en:
Savoeun is a 46-year-old woman who lives in Romeas Haek district, Svay Rieng province. She owns and operates a rice farming business, which is the sole source of her family's income. Savoeun has great support from her husband and children. She has been in this occupation for more than 24 years. Savoeun has four children, but only two of them are living under her care.

As it is her first loan, Savoeun aims to invest in the purchase of a solar home system to install on the roof of her house, which is located in the off-grid area of the province. After this initial investment, Savoeun will be able to gain access to to clean energy, which she can use to support household appliances such as light, TV and radio, so everyone in her family can even work or study at night. She is very thankful and is hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a solar home system.

loans.name: Azad

texts.en:
Azad is 50 years old, married with two children. One of them is 27 years old. He is married. Another child is engaged and in this year wants to get married. Azad’s wife is a housewife and helps Azad in his business. 

Azad is a cook. He makes national candies: “Samani Halvasi”. This is hard and time-consuming work. However Azad loves his job. It’s noted that he makes “Samani Halvasi” then he sells this product to local markets and stores.

 Today Azad needs a loan in the amount of 2300 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan he wants to buy a new gas stove. Azad says he is thankful to Kiva organization and lenders for their help.

loans.use: to buy a new gas stove

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline has a clothes-selling business and has run it for the past five years. Besides the clothes-selling business as her primary activity, she sells soap detergents and also does outside catering. She is 33 years old and married. Together with her spouse they have been blessed with two children. Her spouse also provides additional income.

She plans to use this loan to buy chemicals for making soap detergents to sell. She anticipates making more income, which she will use to open a shop for selling her items. 

This is her first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and her future hopes are to open several shops for her businesses.

loans.use: to buy chemicals for soap production.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is 25 years old, married, and has two children. He used his previous loan to buy bananas to sell. His business is selling fresh foods as well as farming. He is facing challenges of price fluctuation and inadequate preservation equipment. 

Christopher is requesting another loan, which he will use to purchase more bananas to sell. He hopes to have enough capital to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas to sell

loans.name: Martin

texts.es: El señor Martin de 26 años de edad,, vive en concubinato con la señora Relinda hace más de 3 años, ambos tienen una instrucción de nivel primario ya que no cuentan con muchos recursos, tienen 2 hijitas dependientes y viven hace 3 años al norte de Colomi. El señor es una persona  muy trabajadora, se dedica  a la actividad agrícola, sus ingresos económicos provienen de la venta de papa, haba en vaina verde, papaliza y oca cultivando en terreno propio con rotación de cultivos, actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar abono orgánico (semilla gallinaza) con el fin de aprovechar el bajo costo, así tendrá con que sembrar la siguiente campaña agrícola, porque sus cultivos recién van a cosechar, de esta forma lograra otorgarle a su familia mayores beneficios.
texts.en:
Martin is 26 years old. He has lived with Relinda for more than 3 years. They both have a primary school education since they do not have many resources. They have two young daughters who depend on them. They have lived north of Colomi for the past 3 years.

Martin is a very hard worker. He makes a living by working in agriculture. He earns his income from the sale of potatoes, green beans, ulluco, and oca, which he grows on his own land using crop rotations. 

He is currently requesting a loan to purchase organic fertilizer (hen droppings) so that he can take advantage of the lower cost and have enough during the next planting season. His crops were recently harvested. This way, he hopes to provide better benefits to his family.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer (hen droppings).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk (jeans, t-shirts, shirts, pants, jackets, etc.).

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.en:
Khurshed is an entrepreneur from a rural area of Tajikistan. He lives and works in a little village. He is married and has a child. His wife is housewife and she has been busy with bringing up their child.

Khurshed has his own business. He sells children's clothes in a local market. Every season Khurshed  vitalizes his goods. Khurshed likes little children and wants to sell beautiful high quality clothes for children . He is improving their living conditions little by little from the profit from his business. Khurshed is going to buy children's clothes so as to increase his working capital. He is asking for a loan of 7500 Somoni to buy children's clothes. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy children's clothes to increase his working capital

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.en: Zulfiya is 28 years old. She is divorced and has a child who is 3 years old. Zulfiya is a waitress. She works in a café of her region. She gets a salary every month and uses it for providing herself and her child with all the necessary things. Zulfiya has lived through many difficulties. Now, she is ill. Zulfiya must to go to doctor and seek treatment, but she does not have enough money. She is asking for a loan of TJS 1500 to buy medicine for treatment. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy medicine for treatment

loans.name: Herma

texts.en:
Herma is a  37-year-old married woman from the town of Loon, Bohol. Her husband works as a private driver to support their family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store and sells various items like eggs, sugar, coffee, biscuits, noodles  and soap. Her business started more than five years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy canned goods, soft drinks and other beverages. This is very helpful in maintaining her inventory as well as catering for her customers' needs.

In the future, Herma hopes to expand her business to earn more in order to  improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks and other beverages

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a 37-year-old married woman with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She owns a stationery shop from where she also does secretarial work. She gets additional income from farming. Though she has been in business for four years, her hardships include competition and limited capital for expansion. Her vision is to complete her house. Elizabeth intends to use the loan to buy more stationery to sell.

loans.use: to buy more stationery to sell.

loans.name: Jastar

texts.en:
Jastar is 42 years old and married.  Together with her spouse, they have been blessed with four children. She bakes cakes for sale and has been in this business for three years now; it has been profitable. Her spouse also provides additional income.

She plans to use this loan to buy more stock of wheat flour, sugar, and cooking oil for use in her business. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan as well as save some money.  This is her first loan and her future hope is to educate her children to the tertiary (college) level and build a modern house for her family.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 27 years old and comes from Nakuru. He is married to Kessiah and they are blessed with one child aged one year.

Francis has been in the motorcycle transport business for the last four years and he has applied for his second loan of KES. 116,700 from VisionFund Kenya to enable him to buy another motorcycle so as to increase profits.

His monthly income right now is KES.10,000 and he intends to use profits anticipated from his expanded business to start a business for his spouse.In the future, Francis hopes to be financially stable.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab was born in 1980. She is married and lives in a rented house in a sector in of Jordan called Southern Ghour with her husband. Her husband is a bus driver. 

Zeinab has been trying her best to support her husband in improving their living conditions by running her project of selling clothes and cosmetic products at her house for the past year. She needs to expand it more now by buying a larger quantity of clothes and cosmetic products and adding variety to them in order to attract more customers and to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Kefah

texts.en: Kefah was born in 1966. She is married and lives with her husband in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Marka. She has been trying her best to support her husband in improving their living conditions by running her project of selling home products at her house for one year. Now she needs to expand it by buying a larger quantity of home products and adding variety to attract more customers and to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to purchase more home products for her business

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en: Nadia was born in 1969. She is a widowed woman who lives in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa with her 4 sons and daughters. Nadia has been trying her best to support her children financially and to provide them with the best education by running her project of selling clothes from her house for 5 years. Now she needs to expand it by buying a larger quantity of clothes and adding variety in order to attract more customers and to raise her profit. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for her business

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es: Luis está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar enseres para su vivienda, como ollas, platos, entre otros, y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida, así el seguirá trabajando como vendedor en el grifo donde labora y seguirá ahorrando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar un terreno”.
texts.en: Luis is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to their help he will be able to buy household items for his home, such as pots, plates and other articles, and in this way improve his quality of life. This way he will continue working as an attendant in the gas station where he works, and will keep saving in order to make his greatest dream a reality: "To buy a piece of land."

loans.use: To buy household items.

loans.name: Yakelin

texts.es:
Yakelin, vive en un anticretico en la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz, esta soltera y tiene una hija. Viven en la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz.
Yakelin aún sigue vendidendo ropa y accesorios de vestir en forma ambulante pues no tiene un puesto fijo; con esta actividad ella se mantiene y cubre sus necesidades y las de su hija.

El crédito que solicita es para aumento de capital para comprar más ropa y accesorios y continuar su negocio  para poder aumentar sus ingresos.

El sueño de Yakelin es poder darle una mejor vida a su hija. Está en búsqueda de una tienda para alquilar y poder tener un lugar fijo de venta de su mercadería.
texts.en:
Yakelin lives in a leased property in the central area of the city of La Paz. She is single and has one child. Yakelin continues to sell clothing and accessories door-to-door as she has no shop. By doing this she supports herself and her daughter and pays for their necessities. 

The loan Yakelin is requesting is to increase her capital buying more clothing and accessories to continue her business and increase her revenues. Yakelin's dream is to provide her daughter with a better life. She is looking for a store to rent so she can have a fixed place to sell her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  TIESSIRI  sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 49 ans, et ont en moyenne  4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles traditionnelles à   BOUGOULA VILLE un des quartiers populaire de Sikasso 3ème  région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur 12ème  prêt avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Mme   SALI   fait la vente des condiments dans ce groupe de femmes. Elle est assise en 1 ère position de la  droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt une quantité importante des condiments auprès des grossistes au marché. Elle revend en détail sur place et à    BOUGOULA VILLE au comptant avec une clientèle constituée d’hommes et femmes. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000 francs cfa dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The members of the group TIESSIRI are married women, who average 49 years of age and four children each, all living in traditional families in BOUGOULA VILLE, a working-class district of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are on their 12th loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso out of concern for meeting the needs of their customers.

Ms. SALI sells condiments in this group of women. She is sitting first from the right in the photo. With her loan, she intends to purchase a significant amount of condiments from wholesale merchants at the market. She sells at the retail level to a customer base composed of men and women paying cash, locally and in BOUGOULA VILLE. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 25,000 francs CFA. Part of the profits is used to repay the loan with interest, and the other part goes toward her savings.

loans.use: to purchase condiments to sell

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.en: Ibodat was born in 1970. She is married and has 4 children. Ibodat has a medical degree. She is a nurse. Ibodat and her family live poorly. Her salary is small. Her husband is a master at repairing houses. Since last year Ibodat has wanted to repair her house because it is in poor condition but she does not have enough savings. Her children have always wanted to live in a big and comfortable house. She is asking for a loan of 1600 USD to buy building materials such as cement and wood. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and wood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 33 years old, married, and has two children. Unlike other members of his community, he has chosen to pursue agriculture. For 10 years, he has been selling the fresh vegetables and dairy products he has raised at the farmers’ market of a nearby town. 

Ali is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy water pipes for the irrigation of this fields. He noted that feeding children properly has not been pursued in his community, due to our socio-economic issues, but he did not want his children to suffer, which is one of the reasons he became a farmer.

loans.use: to buy water pipes for the irrigation of the planted field

loans.name: Gladys Silvia

texts.es:
Gladys tiene 78  años de edad, su estado civil es unión libre, tiene  dos  hijos,  convive con su esposo e hijos  en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.  

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte al Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Gladys se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y a la crìa de pollos. Solicita el crédito para los insumos que necesita para la agricultura como  abono, insecticidas,  fertilizantes, urea, fungicida y morocho. La compra lo realiza en Ventanas y en Ricaurte. El sueño es aumentar la productividad. El desafío al que se enfrenta es trabajar mucho más. En su tiempo libre le gusta compartir con su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys is 78 years old. She has a partner and two children and lives with them in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province. She is a member of the Palmasola communal bank which is located in the rural settlement of Palmasola which belongs to the parish of Ricaurte in the Urdaneta canton. The locals earn a living from agricultural work and livestock. 

Gladys makes a living from agriculture, growing corn and raising chickens. She is asking for the loan to buy the supplies she needs for her agriculture such as manure, insecticides, fertilizers, urea, fungicide and hard purple corn. She make her purchases in Ventanas and in Ricaurte.

Her dream is to increase her productivity. The challenge she faces is working much harder. In her free time she likes to spend time with her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey does construction business as his primary activity in Kangundo town. He also has a retail shop and does farming. He is 32 years old, married, and, together with his spouse, they have been blessed with one child. His spouse also provides additional income.

Geoffrey plans to use this loan to improve his retail shop by adding more stocks of goods for resale. These include sugar, maize flour, cooking oil, and washing detergents. He will use the anticipated income to expand his business by buying more goods for resale.

This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and his future hopes are to educate his children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of goods to sell in his retail shop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy onions, salt, pepper, tomatoes, etc., in bulk to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Ana de 24 años de edad, es  madre soltera, estudio hasta educación media y ella tiene que velar por su sustento diario y la de su hijo de 3 años de edad, ya que el padre se ha desentendido de ellos. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. A realizar sus actividades agrícolas.
