Ana  se dedica al cultivo de maíz, camina 2 Km para llegar a la parcelas donde siembra y ademas se dedica al cuido de animales (vacas), oficio que aprendió de sus padres.   

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos vacas que le venden, para producir  leche  y ofrecerla a sus vecinos y en los alrededores de donde reside para obtener un ingreso adicional.

 Ana  planea en un futuro, poder comprar mas animales y poder producir mas leche para la venta y lácteos (quesillo, queso, crema, etc)
texts.en:
Ana, 24 years old, is a single mother who studied up to middle school. She has to work to sustain herself and her 3-year-old son. The father refuses to recognize them. She rises at 5:00 am to carry out her agricultural activities. 

Ana raises corn. She walks 2 klm to arrive at the parcels where she sows her crops. In addition, she cares for her livestock (cows), a skill that she learned from her parents.   

The loan Ana solicits from Fundacion Campo is for purchasing 2 cows currently for sale, to produce milk to sell to her friends and residents of the areas surrounding her home, for additional income.

Ana's plans for the future are to purchase more cows in order to be able to produce more milk and make milk products (cheeses, cream, etc.) to sell.

loans.use: to buy two cows that are for sale, to produce milk to sell to neighbors and residents of areas surrounding her residence for addditional income.

loans.name: Maritza Maria

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 53 años de edad estado civil soltera vive con sus padres en el Cantón Urdaneta Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte al Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Maritza se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Con el apoyo del credito podra comprar insumos que necesita para la agricultura como  abono, insecticida,  fertilizantes, urea, fungicida. Las compras  lo realizan en Ventanas y Ricaurte.  Su  sueño es comprar un terreno para construir una casa. El desafío al que se enfrenta es las plagas del maíz. En su tiempo libre le gusta descansar, ver televisión y pasar con su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza is 53 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in Urdaneta Canton, Los Rios Province. She is a member of the "Palmasola" communal bank which is located in the community of Palmasola, which is part of Ricaurte Parish in Urdaneta Canton. The members work in agriculture and raise livestock.

Maritza is a farmer who grows corn. With the help of the loan she will buy inputs necessary for her farming like fertilizer, insecticides, manure, urea and fungicide.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas and Ricaurte. Her dream is to buy land to build her house. The challenge she faces is infestations of her corn crops. In her spare time she likes to relax, watch TV and spend time with her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Nem

texts.en:
Nem is 61 years old, married, and has seven children. She is a farmer from a rural village of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham. She has been operating a rice farming business for more than 30 years. From day to day, Nem tries her best in her farming work because she wants to ensure a better crop yield to augment her income.

Nem would like to improve her family's sanitation practice and help them live in more hygienic conditions. That’s why she is taking out a loan to build a safe latrine for use at home. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Nem is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a safe latrine for use at home.

loans.name: Jimmy Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael tiene 42 años de edad  estado civil soltero,tiene dos hijos vive con sus padres en el Cantón Urdaneta Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Rafael se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de maíz y arroz.  Solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos y para dar mantenimiento especifico a sus siembras.

Vende sus productos en Ventanas. El sueño es mejorar su vivienda y fortalecer su negocios. El desafío que enfrenta  es el mal tiempo. En el tiempo libre le gusta estar con su familia y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Rafael is 42 years old, single, and has two children. He lives with his parents in the canton of Urdaneta, in the province of Los Ríos. He belongs to the Palmasola communal bank, which is located in the rural area of Palmasola, which belongs to the parish of Ricaurte and the canton of Urdaneta. The locals work in agriculture and livestock. 

Rafael works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. He is requesting a loan to buy supplies so he can give specialist care to the crops he sows. 

He sells his produce in Ventanas. His dream is to improve his home and strengthen his business. The challenge he faces is bad weather. In his free time he likes to spend time at home with his family and do sport.

loans.use: to buy what he needs for sowing corn.

loans.name: Lenin Daniel

texts.es:
Lenin tiene 27 años de edad, su estado civil es unión libre,  tiene dos hijos convive con su esposa en el Cantón Ventanas  Provincia de Los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Lenin se dedica a la siembra de maíz y a la crianza de gallinas. Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, abonos. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá  comprar los fertilizantes a menor precio por tratarse de ser al contado.  

 Las compras lo realiza en el cantón ventanas.

Su sueño es mejorar su cultivo y la producción para tener una mejor calidad de  vida. El desafío  que enfrenta es combatir contra la naturaleza.  En su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Lenin is 27 years old, married and has two children. He lives with his wife in the Ventana canton of the Los Ríos province.

Lenin is a member of the Palmsola communal bank in the Palmasola area of the Ricaurte parish. Ricaurte in is Urdaneta and here the people work in farming and raising livestock.

Lenin works growing corn and raising hens. He is applying for this loan in order to buy fertilisers, manure and supplies. With the help of this loan he will be able to buy fertilisers at a cheaper price as he can pay for them in cash.

Lenin makes his purchases in the Ventanas canton.

Lenin's dream is to improve his crops and production in order to enjoy a better quality of life. One challenge that he is facing is dealing with nature. In his free time, Lenin likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina, es casada, no tiene hijos por el momento, no posee ayuda del extranjero, para tener ingresos extras se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños,  hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema en dedicarse a este negocio.
Con el préstamo comprara blusas, camisas, pantalones, faldas y trajes para niños, con lo que surtirá el inventario de su negocio y mejorara las ofertas para que sus clientes mantengan su fidelidad, espera mejorar sus ventas y tener una economía más estable.
Sueña con mejorar sus ingresos y hacerle mejoras a la infraestructura de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Reina is married but does not have any children for the moment. She receives no help from relatives living abroad but makes a living selling clothes for men, women's and children. She has, so far, not had any problems running this business.

Reina will use this loan to buy blouses, shirts, trousers, skirts and suits for children. This will allow her to stock up and offer better products so that her customers remain loyal. Reina hopes to improve her sales and have more stable finances.

Reina dreams of improving her income and making improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, trousers, skirts and suits for children.

loans.name: Nimraz

texts.en: Nimraz is 22 years old. She is living in a rented house in a sector in Jordan called Salt. She lives with her family of four siblings and her parents. Her mother is retired. Nimraz was studying for a Bachelor's degree with a major in Accounting. Then she changed her major to Computer Information Systems. She is planning to find a job that suits her study field after graduation in order to start supporting her family financially. They are facing a financial crisis, which is preventing them from paying her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is a hardworking married man with one child who lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns a tea plantation and also works as a pump attendant at a Shell Petrol Station where he earns extra income. He works both jobs as a way to overcome the ongoing economic changes facing his country. Seasonal changes affect his productivity, but his dream is to buy more land and grow more tea. Paul has asked for a loan to buy fertilizer and manure to use when growing tea.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure for his farm.

loans.name: Rafia's Group

texts.en:
Rafia is a 29-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children: two sons and a daughter. Her whole family is fully dependent upon her husband, as he provides the only source of income. Her husband owns a small workshop in which he troubleshoots and sells sewing machines. He wants to buy new spare parts at cheap rates for assembling into sewing machines for resale. But due to financial constraints he is compelled to take a new loan.
 
Therefore, Rafia requested a loan for her husband so that he would be able to buy new spare parts for making sewing machines. Rafia thanks Kiva, Kiva’s lenders, and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy new sewing machine parts for repairing and selling machines.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela 
Puntarenas

Marcela tiene 41 años de edad, es una madre de 2 niños y  jefa de hogar, recibe una pensión,  una beca y además su micro empresa le permite llevar una mayor solvencia económica a su familia. Se dedica al comercio desde hace más de 10 años, y ha solicitado crédito a Fundación Mujer anteriormente, teniendo una buena moral de pago, además de contar con crédito de proveedores para la mercadería que obtiene. Mantiene una clientela leal, y su idea es aumentar su patrimonio, contando con más mercadería para surtir los pedidos de sus clientes.

Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia, tiene proveedores e historial de crédito con el que ha forjado su emprendimiento, desea crecer para seguir apoyando a su familia, contando con capital de trabajo para comprar mercadería y ofrecer otros productos a sus clientes.

En el último año ha comprado bisutería fina, oro laminado, plata y acero, que está muy de moda en la zona del Pacífico Central de Costa Rica, donde vive. Maneja una cartera de clientes estable, le brinda crédito y cobra por quincena, el proveedor también le da crédito y ha mantenido un comercio constante en la región central de Puntarenas, en donde es muy conocida. Sale a cobrar y vender en las tardes, luego de atender a sus hijas, se traslada en bicicleta por el barrio y va a la capital (San José) a comprar su mercadería.
texts.en:
Marcela, 41, is a mother of two and the head of her household.  She receives a pension and a grant, and her microenterprise allows her to provide more economic security for her family.  She has been working in commerce for more than 10 years, and has requested a loan from Fundación Mujer before.  She is conscientious in financial matters, and has credit with the suppliers of her merchandise.  She maintains a loyal clientele, and her goal is to increase her assets and have more merchandise to fill her customers' orders.

Marcela has more than 10 years of experience.  She has suppliers and a credit history which has enabled her to forge her business.  She wants to grow so she can continue supporting her family and have working capital to buy merchandise and offer her customers other products.  

In the last year Marcela has purchased fine costume jewelry, gold-plated jewelry, silver jewelry, and steel jewelry, which is in style in the central pacific zone of Costa Rica where she lives.  She keeps a portfolio of regular clients and offers payment schedules, collecting payments every two weeks.  She also has credit with her supplier and has maintained regular business in the central part of Puntarenas, where she is well known.  She goes out to sell and collect payments in the afternoons after attending to her daughters.  She uses a bicycle to get around the neighborhood and goes to the capital (San José) to buy her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy silver, steel, and fine costume jewelry to sell

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: María de 32 años de edad reside junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de seis y un año de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de perfumería, cremas, queso y miel. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad, desde hace 5 años. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de inventario ya que desea incrementar sus ventas y por consecuencia sus ingresos. Con el monto solicitado comprará: lociones, cremas, queso y miel, espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder hacer la inversión lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old and lives with her life partner and her two children who are six and one year old. She sells perfumes, creams, cheese and honey. She has been a street vendor selling in the main areas of her town for almost five years.

She is asking for this loan through FUSAI in order to invest in her business and buy as much stock for inventory that she needs in order to increase her sales and therefore her income. With the amount she has requested she will buy lotions, creams, cheese and honey. She hopes to have this funding in order to make her investment as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, cheese and honey.

loans.name: Mijgona

texts.en:
Mijgona, a 24-year-old divorced woman, is the sole provider for her two children, ages four and two. She sews national dresses in her house which she shares with her parents and brother. 

Mijgona’s brother is going to be married but lacks the money to organize the wedding party. She is therefore requesting a loan of 3500 somoni to organize the party. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To organize her brother’s wedding party

loans.name: Stanley

texts.en: Stanley  is 33 years old, married and the father of one child who is 12 years old. He has earned a living for the last nine years by running a bakery. Right now his monthly income is KES. 80,000.  He is requesting a loan to buy wheat flour, sugar and cooking oil to use in his bakery. He will also buy a modern oven for baking, and use the profits he expects to earn to buy land in the town of Tala and relocate his business there. This is his third loan with VisionFund Kenya and his hopes in future are to have a baking factory and give his children the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, cooking oil and an oven.

loans.name: Mirzomidin

texts.en: Mirzomidin is 54 years old, married and the father of six children. He is an attentive father and has had a business growing vegetables and other crops for more than 10 years. He grows maize, cotton, strawberries and other items. Mirzomidin grows his strawberries in a greenhouse, and earns a good income from this work. He is about to begin working on a new crop and is requesting a loan for 10,000 somoni to buy mineral fertilizers and fittings for his greenhouse. He is grateful for the support he receives from IMON and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and fittings for greenhouse

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies and uniforms to sell

loans.name: Rosiris

texts.es:
Rosiris, a sus 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos, por quienes ha luchado incansablemente para darles el sustento diario.
Desde hace aproximadamente 10 años realizó un curso de capacitación en elaboración de juguetes de tela, gracias a ello, hoy en día se gana la vida elaborando y comercializando muñecos, gorros, juguetes en forma de animales, entre otros, el taller está ubicado en su vivienda, por lo que puede ser productiva, al mismo tiempo que cuida de sus hijos.
El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, algodón siliconado, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y podrá ofrecer mayor variedad para satisfacer los gustos diversos de sus compradores, especialmente los niños que son sus clientes potenciales.
Rosiris manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es montar su taller en un local comercial del centro de la ciudad donde reside, así podrá mejorar las ventas y estará en la capacidad de brindar un mejor bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosiris, at 47 years old, is a single mother of three children for whom she has tirelessly struggled to give their daily sustenance. About 10 years ago, she took a course in the making of cloth toys. Thanks to that, today she makes a living making and selling dolls, hats, and toys, etc in the shape of animals. The shop is located in her home, as she be productive and at the same time care for her children.
She will invest the loan that she is requesting in wholesale supplies (fabric, thread, silicon cotton, etc.) This will allow her to continue with her work and she will be able to offer a better variety to satisfy the diverse preferences of her buyers, especially the children that are her potential customers. Rosiris says that her greatest desire is to start a shop in a commercial location in the center of the city where she lives. This way, she would be able to improve sales and she will be able to provide a better well-being for her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies wholesale (fabric, thread, silicon cotton, etc.)

loans.name: Yelly Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela es una joven de 16 años que termino los estudios escolares el año anterior, ya graduada, ella pensaba mucho lo que iba a estudiar, se decidió por estudiar cosmetología y estética integral en campoalto una prestigiosa institución.

las expectativas que tiene, es ser una excelente profesional, lo cual lo va a cumplir paso a paso, ella aspira que en el tiempo q va estudiar en campoalto logre tener muchos conocimientos para que así le vaya muy bien en los estudios y pasar todo con muy buenas calificaciones, quiere tener las prácticas en prestigiosos spa de la ciudad, para socializarse más con el trabajo.

Cuando Marcela logre el titulo de técnica laboral en cosmetología y estética integral quiere desarrollar todos los conocimientos en un buen lugar de trabajo hasta que tenga la oportunidad de continuar los estudios profesionales, cuando esto ocurra ella pensó en una meta, la cual es tener el propio negocio creando un spa.

El spa que ella piensa tener lo pretende convertir en uno de los mejores  de la ciudad, al cual vayan muchas personas importantes del medio, para así tener buena atención al cliente, poderlos atender como cada uno se lo merece, con mucho respeto, inculcando cada uno de los valores, creando un lugar lleno de paz y armonía.

Marcela al lograr todo esto se sentiría muy orgullosa de sí misma y también lograría tener una mejor calidad de vida para la familia y para ella.
texts.en:
Marcela is a 16 year old youth who finished her secondary studies last year. As a graduate she thought a lot about what she is going to study and opted for studying Beauty and Esthetics at Campo Alto, a prestigious institution.  

The goal she has is to become an excellent professional, which she will accomplish step by step. She hopes in time, to study at Campo Alto, to gain much knowledge, so she can do well in her studies and she can pass everything with good marks. She wants to do her practicum in a prestigious spa in the city and socialize more in her work. 

When Marcela gets her degree as a working technician in  Beauty and Esthetics she wants to develop all her knowledge in a good work place until she has the opportunity to continue her studies. When this happens she will be thinking one thing: which is to have her own business, create a spa. The spa she is thinking about will become one of the best in the city, frequented by the best people in the business. In order to give good service to her clients she would treat each one as they deserve, with much respect, creating a place filled with harmony and peace. Marcela will feel proud of herself having achieved all of this and will at the same time be able to provide a better quality of living for her and her family.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde de 59 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hijo quien con muchos esfuerzos se encuentra estudiando en la Universidad. Matilde hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su hijo lo necesario ya que para ella lo más importe es él y desea que tenga mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido. Matilde se dedica a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad como: huevos, pollo, chorizo y lácteos. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería ya que desea mejorar sus ganancias y este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercaderia para el negocio como: huevos, embutidos, lácteos, pollo y carne.
texts.en:
59-year old Matilde lives in her own house together with her son who after a great deal of hard work is studying at university. She does all she can to give her son the necessities of life. In her eyes he is the most important person in her life, and she wants him to have a better standard of living than she had.

Matilde sells basics such as eggs, chicken, sausage, and milk products in the main streets of the town where she lives. She now wishes to invest in her business by buying more merchandise as she wants to earn more money. Her business is her main source of income.

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy items such as eggs, cold cuts, dairy products, chicken and meat.

loans.use: buy eggs, cold cuts, dairy products, chicken and meat

loans.name: Brenda Lisbeth

texts.es: Brenda de 22 años habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad quienes a la fecha se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Brenda posee una pequeña tienda en la que vende variedad de productos como: dulces, galletas, pan dulce, golosinas, etc. Así se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con mucho esfuerzo junto a su compañero de vida han logrado construir su vivienda la cual es su principal patrimonio. Lastimosamente, no lograron terminar de construir el corredor a la casa por lo que cuando llueve el agua se filtra mojando sus pocas pertenencias y deteriorando las paredes de la vivienda. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: pilares, lámina, y polines para construir el corredor lo antes posible.
texts.en: Brenda is 22 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and two children, ages 7 and 2 who attend the local public school.  Brenda has a small store where she sells a variety of products such as candy, cookies, sweet bread, snacks, etc.  She earns a living and supports her household this way.  She and her husband have managed to build a house with great effort, unfortunately they were not able to finish the roof and the water leaks in when it rains, soaking all of their few positions and damaging the walls.  She is asking for this loan through FUSAI to buy supplies such as pillars, metal, and girders to finish the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to finish her roof.

loans.name: Lideres De Villa Rica Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Líderes De Villa Rica” está conformada por 11 socios trabajadores y responsables, la cual pasan a su 6to ciclo. Rosa de 38 años es casada y tiene 03 hijos aún dependientes. Rosa comenzó en la venta de prendas de vestir, por problemas económicos tuvo que dejar dicha actividad. Actualmente brinda servicio de limpieza obteniendo ingresos para su hogar. El crédito que solicitó lo destinará para la compra de algunos medicamentos para su padre, ya que se encuentra delicado de salud. El deseo de Rosa es de volver a ofrecer sus prendas de vestir. El grupo “Líderes De Villa Rica” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Rosa se encuentra de pie es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo negro.
texts.en: The “Líderes De Villa Rica” communal bank is made up of 11 responsible and hardworking members in their sixth cycle.  Rosa is 38 years old, married, and has three children who still depend on her.  Rosa began selling clothing because of financial difficulties that she had.  Now she provides cleaning services to earn money for the household.  She will use the money from this loan to buy some medication for her father because he is in poor health.  Rosa wants to start selling clothing again.  The “Líderes De Villa Rica” group is grateful to those who made this possible through the loan.  Rosa is standing and is the second from the right wearing a black polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy medication

loans.name: Enkhtaivan

texts.en: Mr. Enkhtaivan, 28 years old, lives with his wife and two daughters in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been repairing wheels since 2010 for living. Using his previous loan, he purchased welding apparatus which greatly improved wheel repair efficiency. Now he is requesting a loan of 1000000 MNT to buy wood and coal to heat his ger. As a result, his family can live in warm place.

loans.use: To buy coal and timber

loans.name: Iral Isabel

texts.es:
Iral, es casada, tiene tres hijos de 22, 20 y 18 años de edad, para sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la venta de pupusas, lo hace de 6:00 p.m. hasta las 8:00 p.m., lo aprendió dentro de su familia y es apoyada por su familia, hasta la fecha no ha tenido ningún problema que le dificulte realizar dicha actividad.
Con el préstamo comprara chicharrón, quesillo, harina, aceite, bebidas, entre otros productos necesarios para que su negocio esté debidamente surtido y dar un mejor servicio, espera tener más clientes, aumentar sus ventas y mejorar su economía.
Desea mejorar las condiciones en las que vive junto a su familia y cancelar con buen record su crédito.
texts.en:
Iral is married. She has three children, who are ages 22, 20, and 18. In order to provide for her family, she works selling pupusas. She does this from 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm. She learned within her family and her family supports her. So far she hasn't had any problems or difficulties in carrying out this business.

She will use the loan to buy pork rind, cheese, flour, oil, drinks, and other products she needs in order to properly stock her business and give better service. She hopes to reach more customers, increase her sales, and improve her economy.

She wants to improve her and her family's living conditions and pay off her loan with a good record.

loans.use: to buy pork rind, cheese, flour, oil, drinks, and other items.

loans.name: Dúo Antidoto Group

texts.es:
Dúo Antídoto

Este Dúo está conformado por doña María Irene de 30 años se dedica desde hace más de diez años a la crianza de marranos y pollos. En el crédito anterior doña Irene tuvo 40 días de atraso debido a que se enfermo y no pudo trabajar pero gracias a Dios ya está bien y ha empezado a trabajar arduamente. El sueño de ella es tener ingresos para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella quiere que lleguen a tener alguna profesión. Solicita el crédito para la compra de concentrado, y animales para criar y engordar. También agradece el gran apoyo que Fape Y Kiva le ha brindado.
texts.en:
The Dúo Antídoto group was formed by María Irene who is 30 years old. She has been raising pigs and chickens for more than 10 years. Irene was 40 days late in her previous loan as she was sick and could not work but thanks to God she is well and has begun to work hard. Her dream is to have income in order to bring up her children and she wants them to have a profession. 

She is asking for this loan to buy animals to raise and fatten and animal feed. She is grateful for the support that Fape and Kiva have provided her.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and fatten

loans.name: Dúo Roca Fuerte Group

texts.es:
Dúo Roca Fuerte
Duo conformado por don Martin Rocael  es propietario de un taller de electromecánica desde hace mas de 18 años, tiene muchos clientes por el buen servicio que presta y solicita el crédito para comprar cables y materiales para realizar su trabajo de electromecanica esperando que ustedes le puedan ayudar con el credito que esta solicitando el ya trabajo un credito anterior y no a caido en mora les agradese por la ayuda que le han brindado en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Dúo Roca Fuerte group of two people was formed by Martin Rocael who has been the owner of an electromechanical workshop for more than 18 years. He has many customers because of the good service he offers. 

He is asking for this loan to buy cables and supplies in order to do his electromechanical work. He is hoping for support through the loan he is requesting. He had a previous loan and did not fall behind in payments. He is grateful for the help that has been given to his business.

loans.use: to buy materials for an electromechanical workshop

loans.name: Johana Vannesa

texts.es: Johana está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo y gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder colocar falso piso en la vivienda donde habita ya que el piso aun es de tierra y de esta manera podrá ir mejorando su calidad de vida y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:2 Terminar de construir su vivienda y poder darle una vida digna a su hijo de 10 años”.
texts.en:
Johana is very thankful for the Kiva lenders since this is the second time that she has gotten support. Thanks to the help that has been provided, she will be able to buy construction materials so that she can install a floor in her home.  The current floor is made of dirt. 

This will improve her quality of life and will help her make her biggest dream to come true - to finish building her home and to be able to provide a dignified life to her 10-year-old son.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Nibia Marina

texts.es: La señora Nubia habita en el municipio de Ticnatepe en la comarca llamada Las Dispersas junto a su esposo e hijos, quienes son mayores de edad y la apoyan economicamente ya que trabajan, ella se dedica a la cosecha de Cafe desde hace 30 años, tiene aproximadamente 9 manzanas de tierras cultivadas, el credito lo solicita para darle mantenimiento especificamente a 2 manzanas de cafe que estan proximas a sacar, comprara insumos agricolas como: completo, urea, triple, etc. ademas pagara parte de mano de obra en el caso de cortadores contratados. Agradece el apoyo que Kiva y Afodenic le estan brindando
texts.en: Nubia lives in the town of Ticnatepe in the region of Las Dispersas together with her husband and their children, who are older and who help her financially by working. She has worked as a coffee farmer for 30 years, and she has nine plots of farmland. She is requesting this loan for upkeep on two specific plots of land that she is about to harvest, to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, as well as to pay for contracted laborers. She is grateful for the assistance that Kiva and Afodenic are providing.

loans.use: purchase agricultural products.

loans.name: Erliz Milagro

texts.es:
La señora Erliz es una persona emprendedora, honesta y seria, vive con su esposo  e hija, en el sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la compra y venta refrescos y gallinas.
Don Erliz el préstamo lo necesita para la compra refrescos y gallinas. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten al tener más mercancía que ofrecer a los clientes y cubrir las necesidades de los mismos y con esto mejorar su situación económica.
Doña Erliz espera que a un corto plazo siga creciendo y consolidándose para que su negocio se  convierta en el más grande y reconocido de la región y seguir apoyando a su familia y que su hija se convierta en una persona honesta con principios y valores. 



Choluteca, Honduras  – Diciembre   del   2013
texts.en:
Erliz is an entrepreneurial, honest, and serious woman.  She lives with her husband and their daughter in the south of Honduras.  Her business is to buy and sell beverages and chickens.

Erliz is seeking this loan in order to buy beverages and chickens.  With the loan, she hopes that the sales in her business will increase due to the fact that she has more merchandise to offer her customers and can better meet their needs.  This will improve her economic situation.

Erliz hopes that in a short time her business will continue to grow so that it becomes the biggest and most recognized in the area.  She hopes to continue supporting her family and she hopes that her daughter becomes an honest person with strong principles and values.

loans.use: to buy beverages and chickens for her business.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto de 55 años de edad, es una persona que solo estudio hasta noveno grado.

 Roberto  se dedica a la agricultura oficio que aprendió de sus padres,  para llegar a la parcelas camina 3 Km.  trabaja durante toda la mañana, mientras su esposa en la mañana ordeña y se dedica a  vender la leche y luego en el transcurso de la tarde el cuida unos animales.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una vaca y producir mas leche para la venta. Con el objetivo de obtener mejores ingresos.  

Él desea comprar mas vacas, para producir lácteos como queso, crema, quesillo, etc.
texts.en:
55-year old Roberto only attended school up to grade 9. He is a farmer and learned about farming from his parents. To get to his fields, he walks 3 km. He works there in the mornings while his wife milks the cows and sells the milk. In the afternoon hours he tends to the animals.

The loan that Roberto is seeking will be used to buy a cow so he can obtain more milk to sell and earn more money. He wants to buy more cows so he can produce milk products such as cheese, cream, and cream cheese.

loans.use: buy a cow and obtain more milk to sell

loans.name: Sai Luong Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Bang, a 24-year-old Thai woman, currently lives with her husband, 2 kids, and the in-laws. One of Bang's kid is in elementary and the other is 7 months old. Bang and her husband work on their family VAC model, which includes a fish pond, farm, plants, cattle and poultry. She will use the loan to buy more fertilizer, pigs, and fish. 

She hopes that with more savings and stability in her income, she can improve her family's living standard and send her kids to school. Bang is the team leader of Sai Luong Group, which consists of 6 ethnic Thai women. In the picture, she stands first from the right.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer, pigs and fish.

loans.name: La Ruche (1) Group

texts.en: Urmant is one of the members of the group La Ruche (1) and is a leader in her group along with nine other micro-entrepreneurs from Brazzaville, Congo. This is Urmant’s very first loan cycle with HOPE Congo. As a hairdresser she will use her loan to purchase chairs and other supplies needed for her hair salon. A key strategy for her to grow her business in the future is to reinforce her business capital through the profits that she earns. One day Urmant dreams of being able to open her very own hairdressing school and to be able to teach other young girls in the community how to style and cut hair. For her family she hopes to ultimately to be able to build a new house for her and her six year-old child.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, es una persona soltera, no pose ayuda del extranjero, para solventar sus gastos se dedica a al cultivo de maíz, su jornada es de 5:00 a.m. hasta las 12:00 p.m., por el momento no ha tenido ningún problema en ejercer esta actividad.
Utilizara el crédito para comprar abono, fertilizantes, plaguicidas, y semilla para preparar el terreno y sembrar sin ningún problema, espera obtener una cosecha abundante y granos con mucha calidad, lo que le ayudara a vender a un mejor precio y tener más ganancias.
Sueña con tener una producción mayor para contar con ingresos que necesita para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: José is single and does not get any help from abroad. He works at growing maize to cover his costs. His working day lasts from 5am to 12pm. Up until now, he has not had any problems carrying out this work. He will use the loan to buy manure, fertiliser, pesticide and seeds to prepare the land and to sow without any problems. He hopes to have an abundant harvest and to produce good-quality grain, which would help him to sell at a better price and to make more profit. His dream is to have a larger production in order to make more money, which he needs to improve his house.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertiliser, pesticide and seeds.

loans.name: Irma Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Irma es propietaria de una tienda de comestibles en la que ofrece a sus clientes artículos de consumo diario como lo son: Azúcar, Frijol, Jabón, Golosinas, Arroz, y artículos de consumo diario. Irma es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 8 años y este es el motivo que le impulsa a seguir trabajando diariamente. Su sueño es darle estudio a su hijo hasta llegar a graduarse y cuenta que su niño también le ayuda a despachar en la tienda. Sus pagos fueron puntuales y adelanto dos cuotas. Agradece el apoyo y se compromete a ser responsable es sus depósitos.
texts.en:
Irma is the owner of a food store in which she offers her customers daily food items such as sugar, beans, ham, candies, rice, and others.  Irma is a single mother and she has an 8-year-old son.  He is her motivation to work hard every day.

Her dream is to provide her son with an education and to see him graduate.  She also wants to mention that her son works with her in the store.  Her payments have been on time and twice they were paid early. She is thankful for the support and promises to be responsible with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy food.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela de 58 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su grupo familiar. Para Ángala y su esposo lo más importante son sus hijos y es por ellos que hacen todo lo que esta a su alcance para darles lo necesario. Ella se dedica a la venta de esencias naturales, la venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Gracias a la calidad de sus esencias muchas personas la prefieren ya que son efectivas para dolores de estomago, y cabeza. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de esencias naturales las cuales son muy demandadas pro su efectividad.
texts.en:
Ángela is 58 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their family.  For Ángela and her husband, the most important things in the world are their sons.  They do everything they can to provide them with what they need.

She has sold essential oils door-to-door for a long time.  Thanks to the quality of her oils, people prefer them.  They are very effective against stomach pains and headaches. 

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of a variety of essential oils, which are in high demand due to their effectiveness.

loans.use: to buy a variety of essential oils.

loans.name: Dúo Cantares Group

texts.es:
DUO CANTARES
La señora Delma de 23 años de edadm, se dedica a la venta de ropa es muy jovencita pero a pesar de eso ellas está luchando para su futuro. Ella no tiene local solo vende en los mercados de Chimaltenango y acatenango  y  ya tiene sus clientes y gracias a Dios le va bien tiene buena venta y esta vez quiere invertir más para tener ganancias en esta época  sus sueño es tener un local propio, ella ya trabajo un credito anterior y no cayo en mora,espera que nuevamente le puedana ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Delma, 23 years old, is a member of the Duo Cantares group. She works selling clothing. Despite being very young she is fighting for her future. She does not have a facility but sells only in the markets of Chimaltenango and Acatenango and already has clientele. Thanks to God things are going well and the sales are good. 

At this time she wants to invest more in order to have income for this season. Her dream is to have her own facility. She already had a previous loan and did not fall behind in payments. She is hoping for support once again with this new loan she has requested.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Thalia Margot

texts.es: Thalia esta agradecida por el apoyo y la oportunidad que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su hogar, de esta manera podrá conservar mejor sus alimentos y seguirá luchando para poder ir mejorando su calidad de vida y poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Thalia is thankful for the support and the opportunity that is being provided to her by the Kiva lenders.  

Thanks to the help, she will be able to buy a refrigerator for her home to better keep her food.  She will continue fighting to improve her quality of life and to make her biggest dream come true - to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make some home improvements. He will buy paint, chairs and kitchen utensils, among other things.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan está muy feliz y agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su gran ayuda el podrá comprar abano, fertilizantes, solventar los gastos de regadío, arado, entre potros para poder mantener su cultivo de platino, con lo cual podrá tener un cultivo sano y poder tener una buena cosecha, de esta manera el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ser una gran agricultor en su ciudad”.
texts.en: Juan is very happy and grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their great support he will be able to purchase manure and fertilizers to cover the costs of irrigation, plowing, etc. to be able to maintain his plantain crops. He will be able to have a healthy crop and be able to have a good harvest. In this way he will be able to improve his income and continue working to be able to realize this great dream: to be a great farmer in his city.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería como juguetes al por mayor para su negocio de venta de juguetes, sobre todo por las fiestas navideñas y de año nuevo, de esta manera ella podrá mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos y así seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ser una distribuidora de juguetes”.
texts.en: Luisa appreciates the help that Kiva lenders have given her, since she will now be able to buy merchandise for her toy store, such as toys in bulk. Her sales and income will increase, especially during the Christmas and New Year holidays. This way, she will continue fighting to make her dream come true: to become a toy distributor.

loans.use: to buy toys in bulk for her store.

loans.name: Ana Karen

texts.es:
Ana Karen, tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera y vive en la calurosa ciudad de ICA en el distrito de Parcona. Actualmente se decida a la venta de productos de belleza, y a la vez también estudia la carrera de ingeniería química en la universidad de ICA.
Por más de  dos años Ana Karen vende estos productos de belleza, negocio el cual le va muy bien, sus principales clientes son sus vecinos y compañeros de la universidad, ella es una persona muy responsable y empeñosa.
Ana Karen, está muy agradecida con los prestatarios de KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más productos de belleza.
El sueño de Ana Karen es culminar su carrera de Ingeniería química y se una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Ana Karen is 24 years old, she is single, and she lives in the warm city of Ica in the Parcona district. Currently she sells beauty products while she attends the University of ICA where she is studying to become a chemical engineer.

For more than 2 years, Ana Karen has sold beauty products and this business has gone very well.  Her best customers are her neighbors and friends from the university.  She is a very responsible and earnest person.

Ana Karen is thankful to the Kiva lenders.  The money will be used to invest in the purchase of more beauty products.  Her dream is to complete her degree in Chemical Engineering and to be a good professional worker.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Ricardo Edmundo

texts.es:
Ricardo, tiene 22 años de edad, es soltero y vive en la ciudad de ICA, junto a su linda familia.
Ricardo,  trabaja como encargado del reparto de papa y maíz en una distribuidora de la cuidad, trabajo el cual lo realiza con mucho empeño y responsabilidad.
Ricardo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de una cocina para su hogar
El sueño de Ricardo es estudiar una carrera, ser un buen profesional, tener su casa propia y de esta manera darle una mejor calidad de vida a su madre.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 22 years old, single, and lives in Ica with his wonderful family. He is in charge of the delivery of potatoes and corn for a local distributor, a job he does with commitment and responsibility.

Ricardo is very grateful to Kiva donors since he will be able to buy a stove for his home with the money. His goals are to take further courses so he can get a good job, have a house of his own, and provide his mother with a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy a stove

loans.name: La Ruche (2) Group

texts.en: Odile is one of the members of the group La Ruche (2). She is a leader in her group along with nine other micro-entrepreneurs from Brazzaville, Congo. Odile has two children of her own and also helps to take care of two nieces and one nephew. Odile manages a small stand where she sells fruit and vegetables. This is her first loan with HOPE Congo and will use the loan to purchase beans, tomatoes, eggplant, and other fruits and vegetables. In her business, she faces daily challenges with her activities and supplies being seasonal and the physical distance between her and her suppliers. To overcome some of these challenges, Odile relies on the quality of her products that she sells and sometimes sells to certain clients on credit if they are good customers. One day Odile hopes that she can transition to a wholesaler of produce and to invest in the future of her children by helping them to find employment.

loans.use: to purchase beans, tomatoes, eggplant, and other fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 33-year-old widowed man with one child aged 5, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. His business is motorcycle transportation together with farming as an additional income. Although he has been in this business for 4 years, he is faced with a difficulty of limited capital. However, he aims at constructing a residential house. Julius has asked for a loan to buy iron sheets for roofing his house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets for roofing his house.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Nazia is 34 years old and lives with her husband and family in Lahore, Pakistan. Her goal is to set aside savings to care for her family, but this seems impossible given the absence of a profitable source of income for the family. Her husband has earned a living for several years by driving a motor rickshaw but his income is insufficient to feed his entire family. He also has to maintain the motorbike and rickshaw’s body but he does not have sufficient money to do this. That is why Nazia is requesting a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so her husband can buy a motor rickshaw’s body. She hopes to be able to set aside enough savings to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to maintain a motorbike and rickshaw body.

loans.name: Genara

texts.en:
Genara is a 45-year-old woman from the town of Cortes, Bohol in the Philippines. She is married with three children aged 20 and up. Her husband works as a carpenter to support their family, while Genara runs a sari-sari (variety) store selling goods like biscuits, sugar, cooking oil, coffee, soap and seasonings. Her business started five years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy various groceries, soft drinks and beverages, to maintain the stocks of her store and make sure she can cater to her customers needs.

In the future, Genara would like to expand her business to provide her family with good food and good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy various groceries, soft drinks, and beverages.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is a 35-year-old female, with three children ages 12, 10, and 9 years old whom she supports. This is her first loan of Ksh 20,000. She was introduced to Vision Fund Kenya by the Vision Fund officer. She has rental houses located at Marereni; she built these houses 6 years ago and she earns a monthly income of Ksh 7250 from the rents. She is planning to use the loan to renovate the houses. She will use the profit to build more rental houses. Her hopes and dreams for the future are to build more rental houses and educate her children.

loans.use: to renovate rental houses

loans.name: Arwa

texts.en: Arwa is a 23-year-old woman who lives with her parents and 3 siblings in a sector in Jordan called Baqaa. She is studying for her bachelor's degree, majoring in English literature. In her 4th year of the program, Arwa is one step away from graduation and plans to go on to get her Master's degree so she can find a suitable job that will let her help her family financially. The family is currently facing financial crisis, which is why they're unable to help her pay for the upcoming semester of classes. This is why Arwa has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay her college tuition.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.en:
Zamira is thirty-one years old and looks after her paralyzed mother, financially and otherwise. 

“My mom can’t do much for herself, so I have to do it all for her. But I do not see Mom as a burden at all, and I thank God that I have her. It’s only both of us at home and we get along very well," she said. 

"About two years ago, I started my little bar-cafe business, which I cannot say has been easy, in an attempt to generate an income for us both. I need to add some more equipment now, and that is where my loan will go to, should the lenders help me financially,” said Zamira, keeping her smile throughout the interview.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her bar-cafe.

loans.name: Ten Nua Group

texts.en:
This is a 43-year-old woman of Thai minority; her name is Hoai. She's married with her two children who still attend school. She and her husband are working as farmers with a lot of agricultural activities, including growing rice and cereal, and breeding poultry and cattle. 

She is now preparing for the next harvest and wants to buy a lawn mower, but it's difficult for her to approach capital. Hence, the loan from Anh Chi Em Program would help her continue her business. 

She hopes that by her constant effort in producing, her children would be more abundant in life, and that both of them will go to college and change their current circumstance. 

Hoai is the team leader of the Ten Nua group, which consists of ten Thai minority members. In the picture, Hoai is standing first from the right.

loans.use: to buy a lawn mower for the field.

loans.name: Karima

texts.ru:
Карима 37-летняя продавщица. Она замужем и живет с мужем и тремя сыновьями в городе Исфара. Ее сыновьям по 4, 7 и 8 лет. Старшие сыновья уже ходят в школу. Муж Каримы в сёлах и районах оказывает услуги мастера по стройке и ремонту домов. Сама Карима занимается торговлей. Она оптом закупает сухую молочную продукцию (курут) и перепродает с наценкой. В Таджикистане есть такой продукт, который называется "курут". Это маленькие и белые шарики, которые вы видите на фотографии. Курут изготовляется путём вывода влаги из сгущённой молочной массы "катыка". Для этого мешочек с катыком подвешивается в тени и влага стекает через ткань в течение нескольких дней. Образовывается густая питательная масса. В него добавляют соль, и потом из него руками катают шарики, диаметром 1—5 см. Эти шарики высушиваются на солнце в течение нескольких дней, иногда доводятся до твердокаменного состояния. Они употребляются как сухарики или размачиваются и употребляются как суп.  
Карима занимается купле-продажей курута в течение 4 лет. Для продолжения торговой деятельности она нуждается в кредите. На сумму кредита Карима хочет закупить партию курута с целью перепродажи. В будущем она планирует расширить свою торговую деятельность.
texts.en:
Karima is a 37 years old saleswoman. She is married and lives with her husband and three sons in the city of Isfara. Her sons are 4, 7 and 8 years old. The eldest sons already go to school. Karima's husband provides a service of constructing and refurbishing houses in the villages and districts. Karima is engaged in trade. She buys in bulk dry dairy products ( kurut ) and sells at a price premium. In Tajikistan, there is such a product called "kurut." They are small and white balls that you see in the pictures. Kurut is produced by the withdrawal of moisture condensed milk mass "katyk." In order to do this, a bag with "katyk" is suspended in the shade and moisture flows through the tissue within a few days. That is how the nutritious dense mass is developed. Then salt is added, and then from this the mass is hands rolled into balls with a diameter of 1-5 cm. These balls are dried in the sun for several days, sometimes brought to the steadfast state. They are used as crackers or soaked and used as a soup.

Karima works with retail. She purchases dairy products and resells them at a higher price. She has worked with this activity for a period of four years. Karima needs a loan to continue her retail business. For the loan amount, she would like to purchase dairy products for resale. She plans to expand her retail business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase and resell kurut (dried dairy product)

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is a 55-year-old Palestinian refugee, father of five children. He is specialized in fixing and maintaining all types of household appliances and many other electronics since 1985. Adnan is a hard worker, who learned this business at the beginning from his father who registered him in a specialized college to develop his knowledge.

Adnan lives and works with his family in a Palestinian camp, which is an obstacle to expand his business since he is limited with the camp citizens. Although he has low income because of the limited access to the camp and narrow labor market, he was capable of providing one of his children a university degree in Math, and is working hard to provide the other the best education ever too. Adnan believes that education is the best weapon against poverty, that's why he is working hard to make sure his children will benefit from a brighter shining future.

loans.use: To buy necessary spare parts to improve his services and respond to his customers needs

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора живет на районе Спитамен. Ей 40 лет. Муж Нигоры находится за приделами страны. Он не нашел работу в родном районе и ему пришлось уехать чтобы прокормить семью. Нигора до сегодняшнего дня занималась мелкой торговлей. Она продавала детскую одежду и носки на рынке. Сейчас Нигора хочет открыть свой бизнес. Она решила заняться куплей и продажей скотов. Содержать скотов она будет в коровнике. Нигора планирует купить необходимое количество скотов и корма для них с помощью кредита, и начать бизнес. Она считается, что данный бизнес принесет хорошую прибыль, что способствует улучшению ее жилищных и жизненных условий.
texts.en: Nigora lives in the Spitamen district.  She is 40 years old.  Nigora's husband is outside the country.  He could not find work in his native district and had to leave in order to support the family.  To this day, Nigora was involved in small sales.  She sold children's clothing and socks at a market.  Now Nigora wants to open her own business.  She decided to get involved in reselling livestock.  She will keep livestock in a cowshed.  Nigora plans to buy a necessary number of livestock and feed for them with the help of this loan and start the business.  She thinks that this business will yield her a good profit, which will help to improve her living and life conditions.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed in order to start her own business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy women's clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha is 28 years old and married with one child. Sokha has been a farmer for almost 10 years. She always gives all her best in managing her farm, which is the major source of her family’s income. Despite her hardships, Sokha aims to provide her child a better quality of life and educate him up to a university degree. Sokha was photographed with her husband in their own house, located in the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham, Cambodia.

In order to help her further develop her farming business, Sokha is asking for a loan to buy a piece of land to enlarge the area she can farm. This loan will be a great help for her to continue working with her farming business. She hopes that her requested loan will be granted and that the coming season brings abundant crops and income.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land to enlarge the area she farms.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба живет в отдаленном регионе. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Махбуба уже более 3 года занимается купле продажей целлофан. Она торгует на местном рынке. Махбуба сама справляется с бизнесом. Она является основной кормилицей семьи, так как ее муж не имеет собственного источника дохода. Махбуба хочет пополнить ассортимент своего товара, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки целлофан, чтобы пополнить ассортимент товара. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mahbuba lives in a remote region. She is a hardworking woman. For three years, Mahbuba has been involved in buying and selling salafan. She trades at the local market. Mahbuba copes with the business by herself. She is the main breadwinner in the family, since her husband does not have his own source of income. Mahbuba wants to replenish her assortment of goods, but does not have money. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase cellophane, in order to replenish the range of goods.

loans.use: to buy cellophane for increasing working capital

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Because Maha is a conservative lady, she asked her mother to take her place in the picture. Maha is a 20-year-old lady who lives in a sector in Jordan called Salt with her parents and 4 siblings. Her father is a retired man who currently works in a governmental entity. She is studying for her Bachelors’ degree majoring in Computer Science. She is in her 3rd year. Maha is planning to work in her study field after graduation to start her work life in order to help her family financially. They are currently facing financial crisis which is not allowing them to help pay her upcoming semester fees. For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay her next semester's fees.

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es: Katherine, tiene la edad  de 22 años, está soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes foliares que le ayuden a mantenerse en buen estado en este periodo de verano, además de pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Katherine is 22 years old. She is single. She lives with her parents and siblings who are her main priority. With this loan, she intends to purchase foliar fertilizers that will help maintain good conditions during the summer. In addition, she can pay for a workforce to help with the coffee and also take advantage of the good soil and climate conditions and other circumstance that favor coffee cultivation. With these improvements, she hopes to earn some income and improve the lifestyle of her family. Also she can invest a little more in the cultivation and reach a few goals. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had loans from other public banks but FUDECOSUR gave her a loan with better facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: with coffee farming.

loans.name: Sobia

texts.en:
Sobia is the age of 37. She is living with her six children and husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband has been selling fruit for many years. He sells seasonal, fresh fruit in his hometown. He uses a four-wheeled, manual cart for selling. As a hawker, he can easily reach people. The people like to buy fruit at their door instead of moving towards the market. Due to fruit’s freshness, he has attained a regular list of customers and he makes enough money to contribute to the family's income. 

Sobia is taking a loan for her husband, so he can buy fruit in bulk. She wants to save the excess profit, so that she can use these savings for future, sudden needs and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy fresh and seasonal fruits for her husband to sell.

loans.name: Suleyman

texts.en: Suleyman is 40 years old, and is married with four children. His elder son and daughter are married, his younger son is studying at his first course of college and his daughter goes to 11th grade. Suleyman’s wife is a housewife. They are IDPs (Internally Displaced Persons) from Kalbajar city and now they are living in the Absheron region. Suleyman has a car and for many years he has been a taxi driver. He transports passengers between different areas of the Absheron region. Previously, he took a loan and every amount was paid on time, so he is a good client. Today Suleyman wants to change wheels of his car. Therefore he applied to Komak for a loan in the amount of 1,350 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). Suleyman says he is thankful for this loan and the Kiva organization and lenders. In the future, he wants to change his car.

loans.use: to change wheels of his car.

loans.name: Soutoura Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre  membres du groupe  SOUTOURA  sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans, et ont en moyenne  6 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles traditionnelles à SANOUBOUGOU I un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso 3ème  région administrative du Mali. 
Elles sont à leur 13ème  prêt avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Mme  AWA  fait la vente des oignons dans ce groupe de femmes. Elle est en première position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt 15 sacs des oignons auprès des grossistes qu’elle revend en détail sur place et au marché. Elle vend au comptant avec une clientèle constituée d’hommes et femmes. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50 000 francs cfa dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The four members of the group Soutoura are married women who are on average 39 year old and have on average six children. Most of them live in traditional families in Sanoubougou I, one the popular area of the town of Sikasso, which is the third administrative region of Mali.
This is their 13th loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to meet their customers’ needs.

Mrs. Awa sells onions among this group of women. She is in first position looking at the photo from right to left.
With her loan, she is planning to buy 15 bags of onions from wholesalers that she will resell retail on the spot and at the market. She sells for cash to customers who are men and women.
She is planning on making a monthly profit of 50,000 Francs CFA, one part will be used to repay the loan and the interest and the other will be saved.

loans.use: to buy onions

loans.name: Kodirjon

texts.en:
Kodirjon is a young and hardworking man. He is not married. Kodirjon is a first-year student. He studies at the Tajikistan State University of Business and Service. He tries to study well. He often goes to the library and internet café because he needs to read background literature. He has good marks and his teachers are happy with him.

 Kodirjon is from a poor family. His parents have not the opportunity to pay for his tuition at the university. He is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Matilda

texts.en:
Matilda is 37 years old, married and together with her spouse, has been blessed with two children. She does farming and has been in this business for the past ten years. She is engaged in growing cash crops, as well livestock keeping. Her spouse also provides additional income.

She plans to use this loan to buy farm inputs, such as fertilizer and seeds, for planting. She will also buy cattle feed for her cattle. She will use the anticipated income to repay the loan and also save some of it. 

This is her second loan term with VisionFund Kenya. Her future hopes are to be financially stable and be able to educate her children to tertiary level.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and cattle feed.

loans.name: John Ufredo

texts.es:
John tiene 34   años de edad, su estado civil es unión libre, tiene dos hijos vive con su esposa e hijos en el Cantón Ventanas  Provincia de Los Ríos. 


Es integrante de ventanilla Palmasola que se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Palmasola, pertenece a la parroquia Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta se dedica  a  labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Jhon se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Las compras lo realizan en comercial Rodríguez en Ventanas. Solicita el crédito  para la compra de insumos como los abonos, ureas, fertilizantes  que es un apoyo económico. Su sueño es mejorar la economía de la  familia. Los desafíos a los que se  enfrentan las dificultades económicas. 
Le gusta hacer deporte y leer el periódico.
texts.en: John is 34 years old in a common law marriage. He has two children, and he lives with his wife and children in  Cantón Ventanas in the province of  Los Ríos. He is a member of the bank Palmasola that is located on the premises Palmasola and belongs to the parish Ricaurte, Cantón Urdaneta. The members work in agriculture and livestock. John is dedicated to agriculture, sowing corn and rice. The shopping is done in the Rodríguez market in Ventanas. He requests the loan to buy supplies such as manure, urea, and fertilizers that are an economic support. His dream is to improve the economy of his family. The challenges are those that confront them, the economic difficulties. He likes to play sport and read the newspaper.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for the sowing of corn.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is a 30-year-old married lady with two children. She lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. She owns two motorcycles for transportation, alongside farming and a restaurant for side income. She went into this business four years ago to raise income for her family. 

She desires to start up outside catering services, but she is challenged by limited capital to reach the required standards of outside catering. Annet will thus use the loan to buy hotel utensils for outside catering.

loans.use: to buy hotel utensils for outside catering.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent is a 30-year-old married man with 3 children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

He sells produce in addition to farming to earn extra income.  Even though he has been in this business for 5 years, he is faced with challenges of poor roads during the rainy season and limited capital to expand his business.  He desires to construct a permanent house and become a leading produce supplier in his area.  

Innocent intends to use the loan to buy produce to sell.

loans.use: to use the loan to buy produce to sell.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is 22 years old and in a sector in Jordan called Mafraq along with her husband. 

She is studying for her Bachelors degree, majoring in Social Science and Services.  She is in her 4th year.  

Heba is one step closer to graduation and is planning to work in her field of study after that to start helping her husband financially, as he is currently facing financial crisis which is making it difficult for him pay her upcoming semester fees.  For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La  señora Delia tiene 20 años de edad, de estado civil soltera actualmente vive con sus padres, pero económicamente es independiente, se dedica a la actividad agrícola en un terreno que le heredaron, en el cual produce papa y locoto con rotación de cultivos. Actualmente solicita un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas (semilla de papa, abono orgánico y productos agroquímicos) de esta forma podrá sembrar en más superficie de terreno y lograra mejorar sus ingresos económicos con el fin de ahorrar para construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Delia is 20 years old, single, and currently living with her parents, although she is economically independent. She works in agriculture, on land that she inherited, where she produces potatoes and peppers, with crop rotation.

She is seeking a loan to purchase agricultural supplies (seed potatoes, organic fertilizer, and agrochemical products) so that she will be able to sow a greater area of land. 

In this way she will be able to improve her income, for the purpose of building her own house.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies (seed potatoes, organic fertilizer, and agrochemical products).

loans.name: Jovid

texts.en:
Jovid is married and has 2 children, for whom he has always wanted to provide a good quality of life. 

It is for this reason that he is going to start a new taxi business. This is how he will earn a living.  From the profits he will provide his children with a good education.  He is asking for a loan of 2000 USD to buy a new car to start his taxi business and, therefore, have the opportunity to improve his living conditions. 

He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a new car to start his taxi business

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is a 57-year-old woman from the town of Cortes, Bohol. She is married with three children. The youngest child is 18. Her husband works as a construction worker to help support their family. 

She makes and sells native baskets to earn a living. Her business started quite a few years ago. She is asking for a loan to buy materials like dried buri (native palm) and wicker (a woven fiber formed into a rigid material, usually used for baskets or furniture). This will help Tita make more baskets, and the income will go for food and pay for school expenses.
 
In the future, Tita would to expand her business and increase business profitability for the schooling of her youngest child.

loans.use: to buy materials like dried buri (native palm) and wicker (a woven fiber formed into a rigid material, usually used for baskets or furniture).

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani was born in 1978.  She is a divorced woman living in a sector of Jordan called Southern Ghour with her only son, who is pictured with her in the photo.  

She currently works as a teacher and at the same time runs a side business of selling accessories, clothes and cosmetics in order to be able to cover her son's needs and to provide him with the best education.  Now, she would like to add selling shoes to her business and buy more accessories and clothing in order to expand her project and raise her profits.  

However, she doesn't have enough money to do so.  For this reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To purchase more clothing and accessories and to add shoes sales to her business

loans.name: Ma. Ivy

texts.en:
Ma.Ivy is a 32-year-old woman from the town of Loon, Bohol. She is married, with two children, ages 3 and 4 year old. She sells load to customers in the community. Aside from engaging in the electronic loading business, she runs a sari-sari store. She sells items like biscuits, cooking oil, vinegar, sugar, soap, and shampoo.  Her business started two years ago. 

Ma. Ivy is asking for a loan to buy various groceries, like canned goods, and additional load. This will help her augment her daily income and continue her livelihood activity.

In the future, Ma. Ivy would like to expand her business to provide for the needs of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy various groceries, like canned goods, and additional load.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor, vive junto a su familia, es casada, tiene tres hijos menores, para cubrir los gastos de su familia instalo una panadería, en la cual elabora diferentes tipos de pan, lo hace con la ayuda de su esposo.
Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar harina, azúcar, manteca, levadura, etc., al efectuar esta inversión tendrá la materia prima necesaria para continuar trabajando y fortaleciendo el negocio, espera tener una producción mayor y una mejoría en su economía.
Sueña tener un negocio más rentable para dar a su familia un mejor estilo de vida y ofrecer una oportunidad de superación académica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Flor lives with her family. She is married and she has three young children. In order to cover the family expenses, she installed a bakery. At the bakery, she makes different types of bread and she receives help from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase flour, sugar, butter, leavening, etc. This investment will provide the necessary raw material needed to continue working and strengthening her business. She hopes to have an increased production and an improvement in her income. 
She dreams to have a more profitable business in order to giver her family a better lifestyle and offer an opportunity of academic improvement to her children.

loans.use: purchase flour, sugar, butter, leavening, etc.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe   BENKADI est constitué de  6 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 37ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles nucléaires dans le quartier  MASSABLACOURA  de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 2ème prêt. Le précédent prêt a été correctement remboursé. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de  condiments à l’image de  RABOUA  qui est la  1ére femme debout dans la photo de la droite vers la gauche. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, diverses quantités de condiments avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte . 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Benkadi group is made up of six women, all married, with an average age of 37 year and four children. They live in nuclear families in the area of Massablacoura in the town of Bougouni.

They met each other through bonds of neighborhood, friendship, and business.  To bolster their financial capacity so as to better run their businesses, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with whom they are on their second loan. The preceding loan was fully reimbursed. This group of women sells condiments, as does Raboua who is the first woman in the photo from right to left. She intends to use her loan to buy various quantities of condiments from the wholesalers in Bougouni. She makes her sales at the market and out of her home, retail and for cash or credit, to a mixed clientele. 
She is planning on making an average monthly profit of 40,000Francs CFA, which will be invested in her activity and used to reimburse the loan.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe  TIESSIRI est constitué de  5 femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 42ans et 4enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles  élargies dans le quartier  MASSABLACOURA  de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur 1er prêt. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de céréales à l’image de AWA qui est la femme du milieu   dans la photo. Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt, 500Kg de céréales avec les grossistes  de Bougouni. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle mixte. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Tiessiri group is made up of women, all married, with an average age of 42 and on average four children. They live in traditional extended families in the area of Massablacoura in the town of Bougouni.

They met each other through bonds of neighborhood, friendship, and business.  To bolster their financial capacity so as to better run their businesses, they joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with whom they are on their first loan. This group of women sells cereals, as does Awa who is the woman in the middle of the photo. She intends to use her loan to buy 500kg of cereals from the wholesalers in Bougouni. She makes her sales at the market and out of her home, retail and for cash or credit, to a mixed clientele. 
She is planning on making an average monthly profit of 20,000Francs CFA, which will be invested in her activity and used to reimburse the loan.

loans.use: to buy cereals
