Due to the good results that she received from previous loans, Ana has decided to request more capital to invest in the purchase of sausage, bread, cabbage, plantains, tomatoes, etc. so that she can continue to strengthen her business.

With her previous loan, she was able to strengthen her business by increasing her sales. She now has new customers and her financial situation has improved due to the financial commitments that she has.

loans.use: to purchase sausage, bread, cabbage, plantains, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Seema

texts.en:
Seema is 52 years old, a married woman and the mother of eight children. For 30 years, Seema has been running a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family at a point in time when her husband was the only bread earner. With the passage of time her sales increased and also her income. Now she has two buffaloes and one cow. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. 

She also sells animals on seasonal basis to generate an extra amount of income. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending her son to college for further studies. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is in her 7th loan cycle with Kashf Foundation with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena is 46 years old, a married woman and mother of six children. The man shown in the photo is Zareena’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. 

He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Zareena has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000, for her husband. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Zareena is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business

loans.use: to buy new tires along with some auto spare parts for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en: Shamim is a 52-year-old married woman. For the past nine years, she has been successfully running a business selling milk with her son, who is also shown in the photo.  Over time, Shamim has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk in her community. She has a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. Currently, Shamim requested a 40,000 PKR loan through the Kashf Foundation to purchase another buffalo along with some utensils, such as bowls and containers. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo along with some utensils, such as bowls and containers.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is taking a loan to buy stocks of sequins, pearls and gum to paste onto shawls that she will sell to the retailers. She has been pasting sequins on shawls for many years and feeding her children. She is a responsible mother, she knows about her duties and responsibilities regarding her family members very well. She always keeps busy and ready to provide better for her children.

She is aged 26 and is a mother of three children. Her husband works in a small firm getting a very low daily wage and coming home very late at night. She has to pick-up and drop off her children herself, manage routine work and complete her embroidery tasks as well. 

Her dream is to construct her house according to the number of children she has; for this purpose she is making savings. Rukhsana is very happy and relaxed after taking this loan because this loan will be the means of increasing her monthly income and savings as well.

loans.use: To buy raw decorative material to paste on shawls.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
El socio Marco Antonio se sigue dedicando al servicio de taxi,el tiene un carro donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hast alas 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el socio tambien se sigue dedicando a la venta de cerveza y gaseosas,el sueño del socio es comprar un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para el carro.
El socio se encuentra contento por el préstamo pues se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y agradece por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Marco Antonio continues to provide taxi services. He has a car that he uses for work from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. Marco has been in this business for eight years and is doing very well. He also continues to sell beer and sodas. His dream is to buy a new car.

Marco is requesting this loan in order to buy tires for his vehicle. He is pleased with the loan and promises to submit his payments on time. Marco appreciates the assistance that has been given to him.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Bahriniso

texts.ru:
Бахринисо уже 6 лет своей жизни посвятила в сфере животноводства. Она с мужем выращивает крупно рогатых скотов у себя в коровнике. Бахринисо нравится ее работа, потому что это выгодный бизнес, и она может больше времени проводить с мужем. У Бахринисо и ее мужа есть двое детей. Сыновья уже взрослые им по 40 и 38 лет. Они работают за приделами страны, потому что не нашли работу в родных краях. Бахринисо 63 года. 
   Бахринисо хочет расширить свой маленький бизнес по купле и продажи скотов, с помощью расширения поголовья продаваемого скота. Она запаслась сеном на зиму, но не хватило денег на приобретения скотов, поэтому она обращается за кредитом с надеждой на поддержку.
texts.en:
Bahriniso has already devoted six years of her life to animal husbandry.  She and her husband have a barn where they raise cattle .  Bahriniso likes her work because it is a profitable business, and because it allows her to spend more time with her husband.  They have two adult sons who are already 40 and 38 years old.  As they couldn't find work in their own country, their sons are currently working abroad.  Bahriniso is 63 years old.

Bahriniso wants to expand her small business which consists in buying and selling cattle.  Specifically she would like to increase her headcount of livestock for resale.  She has stocked up hay for the winter, but she doesn't have enough money to buy cattle.  For this reason, she is taking a loan and hoping to receive some support.

loans.use: to buy and sell more cattle.

loans.name: Matra Group

texts.en: This group is called Matra. It consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. The members of group are very trustworthy, responsible, and hard-working. They have all known each other for a long time and they know each other well. The group has taken a loan of 200,000 YER. Matra is the leader of this group (she is the woman seated in the chair). She is a 54-year-old married woman and has six children. She has been operating a business selling clothing, perfume, and incense for eight years. She started her business to assist her husband in continuing to provide for her children's expenses. She requested a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB which she will use to buy clothes, incense and perfumes so that she can provide her customers with a wider selection and better quality products.

loans.use: to to buy clothes, incense and perfumes to provide for her customers.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is 47 years old, a married woman and mother of six children. The man shown in the photo is Parveen’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. 

He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Parveen has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Parveen is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Jimmy Bernardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al Banco Comunal “Amistad Cusqueña”, él socio sigue dedicándose a al negocio de brindar servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja todos los días para de esta forma apoyar a su familia, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para seguir apoyando  su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Jimmy Bernardo belongs to the communal bank "Amistad Cusqueña". He continues to provide taxi service. He has worked every day to support his family.

He has been working in this business for a long time and it provides him with economic and personal benefits. He would like to continue working so that he can continue to support his family.

He requests this loan to perform maintenance on his car. He is grateful for the loan and he promises to make the payments on time.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Miguel Santos

texts.es: Miguel está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que su apoyo va ser de mucha ayuda para el ya que tiene una parcela y con el dinero del crédito podrá construir un pozo para poder obtener agua para su regadío,  de esta manera podrá dar un mejor mantenimiento a su cultivo y seguir trabajando para poder dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una profesión a sus 2 hijos”.
texts.en: Miguel is deeply grateful to Kiva lenders: their support will be very helpful as he owns a plot of land where, thanks to the loan, he will be able to builds a well, in order to get water to irrigate the land. In this way he will be able to provide better care to his crops and to keep on working to provide his family with a better standard of living, on top of fighting to make his biggest dream come true: to have a house of his own and help his 2 children become professionals.

loans.use: To build a well for his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more perfume, body cream and baby oil as well as a clothing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials in bulk (gold and silver).

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a married woman and the mother of 12 grown children, from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. She has been in a fish-vending business for more than 30 years now. Her husband works as a fisherman. This is the source of their income.

Rosalinda is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks, and other items. Through this loan, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell. Rosalinda hopes of making their fishing business a success.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks, and other items.

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is a 34-year old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. For many years, Aysha's husband has been manufacturing rubber belts for pulleys with an injection molding machine. He buys raw rubber material from market and puts it into the injection machine. The raw material becomes melted under high temperature and then it is injected into the dies, for giving it a round shape, through compression. In this way he manufactures rubber belts for pulleys and then sells the belts at the market and makes enough income to contribute to the family's living expenses.

Aysha has four children and she barely manages to satisfy their needs. She is required to provide them with good food, health, and education. She needs to make additional savings to support her family's well being. She is in her third loan cycle with BRAC Pakistan. Currently she has requested a loan to buy more raw materials for manufacturing so that her husband can increase his sales. He expects a boost in his earnings and wishes to spend part of the profits on the expansion of the business.

Aysha is very thankful to the Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy raw material for manufacturing rubber belts.

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is a 46-year-old married woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. A mother of 11 children, her oldest is 22, while the youngest is 6 years old. Her husband is a fisherman. Virgilia is also engaged in fishing. Aside from fishing she does seaweed farming, to have an additional source of income. She has been in the fishing business for 20 years. She sells fish and seaweed to customers in the community. Due to lack of financial capacity, Virgilia requested a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy additional seaweed seedlings and fishing nets. This will help Virgilia improve her livelihood activity.

 In the future, Virgilia would like to expand her business to support her family and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy  additional seaweed seedlings   and fishing nets

loans.name: Adaibi Group

texts.en:
Adaibi, who is in her late 50's, is a widow with two children, both going to school. She has been a maize and fish seller for eight years. She works from 5:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Adiabi's 5th loan from ID-Ghana, Teshie branch. She used the previous loans to buy both maize and fish to boost her business. She has a very presentable location where she sells her products and gets more customers. She is really doing fine. She is grateful for the loan. She has repaid all of her previous loans successfully. She used the profits to pay school fees, to buy a plot of land and to cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy more maize and fish. She dreams of opening a wholesale outfit so that she can supply to the other retailers. 

Adaibi will share this loan amount of GHS 5900 with her loan group, which has a total of six members. Each member will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more maize and fish.

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es: Luis está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le están brindando el podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, como  como polos, short, bividis, faldas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener un ingreso mas para solventar los gastos del hogar, ya que también trabaja como chofer de taxi, así el podrá seguir esforzándose y trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local propia y una empresa de taxis”.
texts.en: Luis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy merchandise for his small clothes shop such as polo shirts, shorts, underwear and skirts among others.  This will give him an extra income to be able to pay for his household expenses.  He also works as a taxi driver.  With this effort and hard work he hopes to be able to fulfill his dream “to have his own shop and a taxi service”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as polos, shorts, underwear, skirts and others

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a 42-year-old, married mother of four children who works selling shoes to help her husband in supporting their family and covering their needs.

She started this business according to advice from her brother, who is employed in a shoe company and knows the market very well. She opened her retail shoe-selling shop and it provided a very good income for her family, which allowed her to open another branch.

Thus today, she is requesting the current loan to decorate her second established store branch and to increase her business merchandise with a newly-released, attractive collection that will respond to customers needs and increase her business income.

Zeinab is very anxious about this loan, and is working hard to establish her second branch to develop her socioeconomic situation. She hopes that her increased income will help her cover all of her children's educational needs and will make sure that they will benefit from special university degrees. 

She hopes that one day she'll be capable of buying her own shop, instead of renting others' shops.

loans.use: to decorate her second established store branch and to increase the business merchandise.

loans.name: Geronima

texts.en:
Geronima is a married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has five grown children. She has been engaged in farming with her husband for several years now. She helps her husband in tilling their field.

Geronima is asking for a loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for the farm. With this loan, she will be able to improve the productivity of their farm, thus augmenting their yield and income.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Ma. Aniceta

texts.en:
Ma. Aniceta is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of six children from Talibon, Bohol. She is engaged in food vending. She sells snack foods like rice cake and juice to earn a living. 

Ma. Anecita is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients such as glutinous rice, milk, sugar and others. In this way, she will be able to cook and sell more, augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients such as glutinous rice, milk, sugar and others

loans.name: Aiymsuluu

texts.ru: Айымсулуу 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Старшая дочь замужем, остальные дети школьного возраста. У Айымсулуу - среднее образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айымсулуу занимается полеводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айымсулуу, на сегодняшний день имеется: 0,17 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, овощи для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Супруг находится на заработках в России, подрабатывает строителем. Ежемесячно высылает часть своей зарплаты семье в Кыргызстан для поддержания в финансовом плане. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айымсулуу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом -на покупку семян картофеля, а также минеральные удобрения и ядохимикаты для обработки земли. Дети помогают Айымсулуу в полеводстве. Доходы от кредита Айымсулуу планирует вложить в приобретение домашней скотины, параллельно намерена заниматься животноводством.
texts.en:
Aiymsuluu is 42 years old and she is married with four children. Her eldest daughter is married and the three younger children are still school-aged. Aiymsuluu has a high school education and she grows crops as the main source of income for her family. She started in this line of work 18 years ago with the sum of 5,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, she now has .17 hectares of land on which she grows potatoes and vegetables for her own family's consumption and for retail sale.

Aiymsuluu's husband is a migrant worker in Russia who makes his living in construction. Every month, he sends part of his income to Kyrgyzstan to support their financial plan. Their combined monthly income is 13,000 som (KGS). With the goal of improving her family's circumstances, Aiymsuluu has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers and pesticides to help her work the land. Her children help her around the farm. Aiymsuluu plans to use the income from this loan to buy some livestock, as she plans to start raising animals on her farm in addition to crops.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds,  fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Merly Yasmin

texts.es: Merly está muy agradecida con el apoyo que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo Merly podrá compra mercadería para su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, como ropas de baño, short, polos, entre otros artículos, ya que este pequeño negocio le permite un dinero extra para poder solventar los gastos de su hogar, ya que ella traba en una pequeña institución de su ciudad como asistente, de esta manera ella seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un local para su negocio”.
texts.en: Merly is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering her, since thanks to their support Merly will be able to buy merchandise for her little clothing sales business. She sell items such as bathing suits, shorts, and polo shirts, among other items, since this little business allows her some extra money for paying the household expenses. She works as an assistant in a small city institution. In this way she will continue striving to make a reality of her great dream: to have a retail location for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To rapair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 29 years old, a single gentleman who is involved in livestock trading. He learnt about VisionFund from fellow traders in the market, who are already receiving financial aid from VisionFund Kenya. Julius has been in this business for the past ten years, making a monthly income of KES. 20,000.

He has borrowed a fifth loan of KES 80,000 from VisionFund which he intends to use to purchase more livestock for fattening and resale at a profit. 

The anticipated profit will be reinvested to boost his business. His dream is to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening and resale

loans.name: Edwin Gabriel

texts.es:
Edwin, se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo préstamo para invertir en el pago de mano de obra y del alquiler del terreno en donde sembrara granos básicos.
El préstamo anterior lo utilizo para la recolección de la cosecha, con lo que acorto el tiempo de entrega de su producto a sus clientes, su economía es mejor, ha cancelado deudas y ofrece a su familia una mejora vida, su familia aumentado.
texts.en:
Edwin has identified a need to apply for another loan in order to pay labourers and to pay the rent on the land where he grows basic grains. 

Edwin used his previous loan to collect his harvest. This shortened the time it took him to deliver his products to his customers. Edwin's financial situation has improved, he has paid off his debts and he is giving his - now bigger - family a better life.

loans.use: to pay for labourers and the rent on land.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en: Ma. Fe is a 59-year-old married woman from Bien Unido, Bohol. She has six grown-up children. Her husband is a fisherman. Together, they have been engaged in a fishing business for several years now. This is their primary source of income. Ma. Fe works hard to support her husband. Due to lack of capital, she is requesting a loan to buy fishing materials like fishing nets. This loan could be a great help in improving their way of living.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fishing nets

loans.name: Ziad

texts.en:
Ziad is a 34-year-old Palestinian refugee, living and working in a Palestinian camp. He is married with three children. Ziad was very young when his father took him to their neighbor and asked him to teach his son painting houses. 
Sixteen years ago, Ziad established his own business, and started developing it properly to respond to his family's needs.
Although his business is limited to the camp's needs, Ziad has a very good reputation in his business specialized in painting houses and shops.
His good reputation and long experience introduced him to new customers outside the camp who recommend him to others.
This is Ziad's third loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua. His previous loans helped him a lot in building his own family's house. Today, the requested loan will be invested in buying a special tool (painting swing) to paint the houses from outside the building in a safe way.
Ziad is working hard to develop his business with new decorating themes and tools.

loans.use: To buy a special tool (painting swing) to paint houses from outside the building in a safe way.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more seedlings of olive trees to plant on his land.

loans.name: Ana Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia desde hace 20 años. Ana es una mujer increíble ya que a pesar de su edad no se cansa de trabajar y luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos y de esta forma mantiene la economía de su hogar.  Habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea cambiar el techo de la vivienda ya que actualmente, se encuentra deteriorado. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Ana is 50 years old and she has been living in her own house for 20 years. Ana is an amazing woman, and despite her age she never stops working and fighting to improve her standard of living. She earns a living as a house maid, thus providing for the economy of her household. Her living conditions are very poor and she wants to change the roof of her house as it is currently run-down. She is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest it in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets and wood to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy galvanized metal sheets and wood.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
Angela is 29 years old, single, and a mother of two children. She is  a mixed farmer and she has been in the business for the last five years. Her monthly income is KES 19,000.
 
She is currently servicing her first loan from VisionFund of KES 30,000 that will enable her to prepare the land and get planting seedlings. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. Her dream is to improve the living standards of her family

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Renato

texts.en:
Renato is a  married man and a father of two young children from Getafe, Bohol. He has been engaged in the fishing business for more than five years now. This is the source of his income.
Renato is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and to pay for the repair of his boat.
With this, he will be able to improve his catch thus allowing him to sell more fish to the market. In the future, Renato hopes of making his business a success.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and to pay for the repair of his boat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more chicken, plantain, flour, fish, pepper etc. for her business.

loans.name: Georgina Ancelma

texts.es:
Georgina de 58 años de edad, casada con hijos mayores de edad. Es originaria de Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país.  Se caracteriza por ser responsable, trabajadora con ganas de  superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la elaboración de planchas y losetas de cemento para los fosas en los cementerios. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 10 horas diarias ofreciendo sus servicios. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo para la elaboración de las fosas como cemento, cal, hierro, arena, pintura. Para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Ancelma agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Georgina is 58, married and has adult children. She comes from Leon, which is in the west of the country. She is responsible, hard-working and has a desire to improve herself. In her free time she likes to enjoy the company of her children. Unfortunately, she was not able to study for a degree because of lack of funds, and so she had to work from a young age to help out with the household's costs. Thanks to her effort and her desire to get on in life, she works at making slabs and cement tombstones for cemetery graves. She works 10 hours a day in her business.

The reason for asking for the loan is to use the money for work materials for graves such as cement, lime, iron, sand and paint. She would like to increase her income in the near future. Georgina is grateful for the support given by Kiva lenders to allow people of few economic resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a dignified means of work.

loans.use: to invest in capital to stock her business by making and selling tombstones for cemetery graves.

loans.name: Universal Group

texts.en:
These members are part of one of the tradition groups in the Teshie branch, called 'universal'. They are on their sixth cycle with ID-Ghana. The group is composed of six members. The businesses that the members of this group are involved in does vary. They include selling clothing, selling fish, selling fruit, selling food, chicken wings and silver products. 

The loan they are requesting will be useful to a small micro entrepreneur like Comfort L. She has been working with D-Ghana for six loan cycles, entering on the invitation of her friend who is also a member of the institution. Today, she has a business selling chicken wings and fish.
The loan will bring an increase of working capital that she will use towards expanding her business. She will buy more fish and chicken wings from the cold store and sell these products to her customers. This business allows her to generate resources in order to maintain her home for her husband and three children.

loans.use: to buy more fish and chicken wings from the cold store and sell to customers.

loans.name: Imelva Yurisa

texts.es: Imelva, tiene 40 años, es casada, tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, ellos son su fortaleza y motivación, ella solventa los gastos de estudios profesionales de sus hijos. Se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 5 años, además percibe ingresos por alquiler de una piscina. Beneficiaria utilizará el crédito para mejoramiento de su negocio (compra de utensilios de cocina, mesas, sillas, entre otros). Su sueño es tener un Restaurante mas grande.
texts.en: Imelva, 40, is married and has two adult children who are her strength and motivation. She pays for her children's professional education expenses. She has made a living selling food for five years, in addition to earning income from renting out a pool. She will use the loan to improve her business by buying cooking utensils, tables, chairs, and other items. Her dream is to have a larger restaurant.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils, tables, chairs, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a blender and kitchen equipment and utensils

loans.name: Libia Lourdes

texts.es:
La Señora. Libia es socia del grupo de crédito Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, se encuentra formando parte de este hermoso grupo desde hace 5 años, todo este tiempo le ha servido para tener más amistad con todas sus compañeras y con los créditos mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar, vive por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Libia tiene 33 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos que se encuentran estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive con sus abuelitos con quienes comparte los gastos del hogar.
Doña Libia trabaja desde su casa, se dedica a la elaboración de polleras (vestimenta tradicional), este oficio lo aprendió trabajando, teje chompas, carteras, también cría animales como cerdos, cuyes y gallinas. 
Su nuevo crédito es para comprar tela cuyes y gallinas. Su meta es agrandar su taller.
texts.en:
Señora Libia is a member of the communal bank Mujeres de Chilcatotoras. She has been a part of this lovely group for five years; during that time, it has provided her with the friendship of her fellow members and with loans to improve the stability of her household. She lives in the parish of Tarqui in Cuenca, which has many places to enjoy nature because of its hilly terrain. The people there are friendly and courteous and still maintain their culture and traditions. 

Señora Libia is 33 years old. She is the single mother of two children who study in a little school in the city. She does not own her own home, so she lives with her grandparents, with whom she shares the household expenses.

Libia works from her home. She earns her living making traditional embroidered skirts—a trade she learned on the job—and knitting sweaters and purses; she also raises animals like guinea pigs and chickens.

The purpose of her new loan is to buy fabric, guinea pigs, and chickens. Her goal is to expand her workshop.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, guinea pigs, and chickens.

loans.name: Mauro

texts.es: Mauro está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado Mauro podrá comprar una mototaxi, lo que le permitirá poder tener un ingreso extra ya que podrá alquilarla y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida y poder sacar adelante a sus pequeños hijos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en: Mauro is grateful for Kiva lenders who provide him with support. Mauro will now be able to buy a mototaxi, which will allow him to have extra income since he will be able to rent it out. This will improve his quality of life and help him move his young children forward as he keeps working toward his greatest dream: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Vadim

texts.en:
Vadim is 47 years old. He has been married since he was 19 years old. His family is from Fuzuli city and they now live in Baku region. For 21 years already, Vadim’s family are an IDP (internally displaced peoples) from their native land of Fuzuli city. Vadim’s wife is a tailor. He has two sons and a daughter. The elder son goes to eleventh class, the other son goes to ninth class and the daughter goes to first class of medical college. 

Vadim is a taxi driver. Today he wants to increase his business. Therefore he has applied for a loan in the amount of 1000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to repair his car’s interior. He is thankful to Kiva organization for their help. In the future Vadim wants to buy new wheels for his car.

loans.use: to repair car’s interior.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son to work on it.

loans.name: Aiza

texts.en:
Aiza is a 20-year-old married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She is the mother of a one year old baby girl. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in her community. She sells various items like sugar, coffee, soaps, noodles, and canned goods.Her husband is a vendor. He sells RTW (ready to wear). Aiza has been operating her variety store for almost 2 years. She has requested a loan  to buy additional merchandise to sell like noodles, canned goods, condiments, and soft drinks. 

In the future, Aiza would like to expand her business to support the needs of her growing child.

loans.use: to buy  additional merchandise to sell like canned goods, noodles, condiments and soft drinks.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en: Fernanda is a married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She does farming. She grows and sells rice to earn a living. Fernanda is asking for a loan to buy more seedlings and fertilizer for the farm. With this loan, she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm thus, augmenting her yield and profit. In the future, Fernanda hopes to make her farming business a success.

loans.use: to buy more seedlings and fertilizer for the farm.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 14 años y su hijo de 12 años de edad. María se dedica y se gana la vida mediante la prestación de servicios domésticos. De esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar y da a sus hijos el sustento diario. Junto a su compañero de vida ha logrado construir su vivienda la cual requiere de cambio de techo ya que se encuentra deteriorado y cuando llueve el agua se filtra. Además , desea instalar el servicio de luz eléctrica ya que no cuenta con el servicio. Con el monto solicitado María comprará lámina galvanizada y madera y pagará la instalación de la luz eléctrica.
texts.en:
Maria, 36, lives in her own house with her partner and two children; a 14-year-old daughter and a 12-year-old son.  Maria earns her living as a maid, in this way contributing to the household expenses and providing for her children.  

Together with her partner, she has been able to build a house, which needs its roof changing as it has deteriorated and when it rains it leaks.  She also wants to install electricity to provide light which it doesn’t have at the moment.  

With the requested loan, she will buy corrugated sheets and wood and pay for the installation of electric lighting.

loans.use: to buy corrugated sheets and wood to repair the roof of the house and to pay for the installation of electric lighting.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un humilde obrero de un fundo de su ciudad, con su trabajo puede salir adelante y sobre todo apoyar  con los gastos del hogar, trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable.

Jorge agradece el apoyo que le brindan los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, ladrillos, entre otros, para poder realizar mejoras en su vivienda, así podrá tener una vivienda segura y seguirá esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria”
texts.en:
Jorge is a humble laborer in his area of the city.  Thanks to his job, he can get along and above all, help pay for the household expenses.  He works about nine hours a day and believes that he is doing well at work because he is a responsible worker.

Jorge is grateful for the support provided by Kiva and thanks to their help he will be able to buy building material such as cement, bricks and other things to make improvements to his home.  This will provide him with a safe house which will let him continue to work hard to fulfill his dream “to study at University”.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Lidia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Lidia se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Sector 3 Marías, le gusta esta forma de créditos porque le permite salir de la rutina de su trabajo y compartir gratos momentos con sus amigas. Vive por un sector perteneciente a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, este sector es muy turístico ya que es el mirador de la ciudad, su gente se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.
La Señora Lidia tiene 34 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 4 hijos de 14, 6 y 3 años que son gemelos, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio, su segunda hija estudia en la escuela, su esposo se dedica a pulir pisos, la casa en la que viven es propia.
Doña Lidia se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa, cuida a sus hijos y cría pollos y cuyes. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cuyes y pollos. Su meta es tener un negocio propio como un local de comida rápida.
texts.en:
Lidia is in her fourth loan cycle, which she is doing with her friends and group mates in the "Sector 3 Marias" credit group. She likes this form of credit because it allows her to deviate from the work routine and share pleasant moments with her friends. She lives in an area that is part of the Turi parish in Cuenca. This is a very touristic area because it has a vantage point of the city. Her people work in agriculture, animal raising, and sales.

Lidia, 34, lives in a civil union and has four children who are 14, 6, and 3-year-old twins. Her oldest child is in high school, and her second is in primary school. Her husband shines shoes for a living. They live in their own home.

Lidia takes care of the household chores. She also takes care of her children and raises chickens and guinea pigs.

She will invest this loan into buying guinea pigs and chickens. Her goal is to have her own business such as a fast food place.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Rosita Lucia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosita se encuentra desde hace 4 años en el grupo de crédito Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, le gusta esta su grupo porque existe mucha unión y solidaridad entre todas las mujeres. Vive por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, por su geografía accidentada tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, gentil y aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Rosita tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 9,7 y 2 años, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en la escuela, su esposo labora como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su madre con quien comparte los gastos de su hogar. 
Doña Rosita se dedica a la crianza de animales como ganado, cerdos y cuyes, también a la agricultura que es para el consumo de su casa.
El dinero de su crédito es para comprar pollos y cuyes. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Señora Rosita has been in the "Mujeres de Chilcatotoras" communal bank for four years. She likes her group because the members are very close and supportive of each other. She lives in the parish of Tarqui in Cuenca, which has a lot of places to enjoy nature because of its hilly terrain. The people there are friendly and courteous, and they still maintain their culture and traditions.

Rosita is 30 years old. She is married and from that marriage, she has three children who are 9, 7, and 2 years old. Her two older children attend school and her husband works in construction. They don't have their own house, so they live in her mother's house and share the household expenses. Rosita earns her living raising animals like cattle, pigs, and guinea pigs. She also works in agriculture, growing crops for her household's consumption. 

The money from this loan is for buying chickens and guinea pigs. Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Laura Lorena

texts.es:
Laura lorena desea conseguir el convenio con kiva ya que sta estudiando auxiliar de enfermería y quiere sacar adelante su carrera para luego seguir estudiando medicina y hacer su especialización en neurocirugía, para a si poner en practica los conocimientos que aprendió estudiando en campo alto ya que es una base para su profesión.
Es una persona responsable, comprometida con su estudio, desea aportar lo mejor de si misma para con las personas y con las instituciones.
Le sirve de ayuda el convenio ya que puede terminar su bachillerato y graduarse de auxiliar de enfermería y sacar el acta de grado, después entrar a la universidad con los conocimientos adquiridos en los dos años de estudio en campo alto y ponerlos en practica, aportar conocimientos en las instituciones en la cual trabajaría y a si obtener mas conocimientos en el area de la medicina y la salud de las personas.
texts.en:
Laura Lorena wishes to continue her agreement with Kiva and continue studying to be a nurses aid and advance her career, so that, later, she can continue to study medicine and pursue a specialization in nuerosurgery. She wishes to put in practice the knowledge she has learned studying at the upper campus, since it formed the basis for her profession.

Laura Lorena is a responsible person, dedicated to her studies, who desires to achieve the best she can, whether dealing with people or institutions.

Her agreement with Kiva is very helpful, allowing her to receive her diploma, graduating as a nurses aid. Laura Lorena will then enter the university with the knowledge acquired during her 2 years of study at the upper campus and put her learning into practice, acquiring added knowledge in the institutions where she works and, thus, obtaining more knowledge in the area of medicine and people's health.

loans.use: to finance the last of her initial education costs.

loans.name: Ana Lucinda

texts.es:
Lucinda es una persona que quiere superarse, sacar adelante una carrera y atravez de ella poder ayudar a su familia y poner a disposición su conocimiento a otras personas ya que ella hace muchos años trabaja en la cocina preparando platos especiales.
Las personas lo han degustado muy bien en el sitio de trabajo, a las personas les encanta su sason, y como a ella le fascina preparar sus platos deliciosos, tomo la desicion de estudiar, conocer mas la historia de la gastronomía, tener este conocimiento,y a si mismo poner a disposición de los demás personas que puedan degustar los platos que quieran.
No conocemos la historia de la gastronomía, es una tema muy largo y eterno que muchos desconocen y ella ha querido aprender y conocer mas de este tema.
texts.en:
Lucinda is a person who wants to improve herself, get on in her studies and through these be able to help her family and to put her knowledge to use to help others, since she has worked at preparing special dishes in the kitchen for many years. The people where she works have really enjoyed her food and are delighted with its flavour. As she adores preparing delicious dishes, she took the decision to study and to know about the history of gastronomy better, and in this way help other people sample the dishes they like.

We do not really know the history of gastronomy; it's a very long, eternal subject that many people are unfamiliar with, and she wanted to learn and know more about this subject.

loans.use: to complete her studies.

loans.name: Murere

texts.en:
Murere is 45 years old, married to Naisoi and blessed with seven children whom he supports. For the last fifteen years he has been a farmer in Narok County, Kenya. He makes an income of approximately 36,000 KES monthly.

Murere is now servicing his fifth loan of 80,000 KES from VisionFund which will be used to prepare his land for farming and buy various farm inputs to help him get better yields. He intends to use his anticipated profits to support his farm and provide for his family’s basic needs. His dream is to be financially stable.

loans.use: to cultivate his land and buy farm inputs

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El Sr. Mario vive en la comunidad de Liriuni, tiene 38 años de edad, está casado y tiene tres hijos que aún están estudiando, percibe ingresos económicos de la actividad agrícola, produce papa, oca y
haba, y su esposa se dedica a la venta en una  tienda comercial. Actualmente viven en la casa de sus padres y solicita un crédito para la construcción de su propia vivienda ya que la casa en la que están actualmente se encuentra deteriorada, y con esta epoca de lluvia tiene muchas goteras, lo que más quiere es ofrecerle a su familia mejores condiciones para que puedan vivir más cómodamente.
texts.en: Mario lives in Liriuni. He is 38 years old. He is married and he has three children who are still in school. He receives income from farming. He grows potatoes, beans and geese. His wife works at a retail store. They currently live at his parents' house. They are applying for a loan in order to build their own house since where  they live now is deteriorating. With this rainy season, there are lots of leaks. What he wants most is to offer his family better conditions so that they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: build his home.

loans.name: Lucero

texts.es: Lucero, tiene 22 años, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres. En su propia vivienda tiene una bodega, en el cual ofrece el servicio de recargas virtuales de celulares. Beneficiaria utilizará el crédito para invertir en su negocio (compra de mercadería para la bodega y ampliar la línea virtual para las recargas). Su sueño a corto plazo es estudiar una carrera profesional, ayudar a sus padres a construir su casa para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellos.
texts.en: Lucero, 22, is a single woman who lives with her parents in their house.  In her own house, she has a grocery store in which she offers an online phone credit service.  She would get a lot of benefit if she could invest this loan in her business (buying supplies for the store and expanding the line of phone credit she offers).  Her short term dream is to study a profession and help her parents build their house to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the grocery store and expand the range of online phone credit.

loans.name: María Marleny

texts.es:
María es madre de un hijo de 9 años y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental.  A sus 50 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, vendiendo todo tipo de mercancía por catálogo, trabaja todos los días y sus principales clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos, esto le ha permitido generar recursos para el sustento de su familia durante los últimos 15 años que lleva trabajando como independiente.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el crédito para comprar mercancía en promoción y al por mayor (ropa, calzado, accesorios, cosméticos, perfumería, entre otros), esto le permitirá ofrecer mejor variedad  y un precio más bajo a sus clientes, lo que le ayudará a fidelizarlos y mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
El sueño de María es ampliar y fortalecer su negocio, ofreciendo a sus clientes mayor variedad de artículos de excelente calidad a buen precio y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, para disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida y dar a su hijo una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Maria lives in a civil union with her partner and has a 9-year-old son. At 50 years old, she works as an independent vendor, selling all kinds of merchandise from a catalogue. She works every day and her primary customers are her neighbors, family members, and friends. This has allowed her to earn income to support her family for the last 15 years, which she has done through working independently.

With the motivation of strengthening her business, she has requested a loan to buy promotional wholesale merchandise such as clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and perfume. This will allow her to offer her customers a better variety of products at a lower price, which will help her build loyalty and improve her sales and income.

Maria's dream is to grow and strengthen her business, offering her customers a larger variety of excellent quality products at a good price. This will make her business more profitable so she can enjoy a better quality of life and give her son a better education.

loans.use: to buy wholesale promotional merchandise such as clothing, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and perfume.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es comprar un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar continues his work as a taxi driver, responding to service calls from 8:00 every morning until 7:00 every night. He has many years of experience in this industry, and he feels that business is going well. Julio's dream is to one day buy a new car for his business.

With the support from this loan, Julio plans to purchase tires for his taxi. He is very grateful for this opportunity and promises to make all scheduled loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his taxi.

loans.name: Moustafa

texts.en:
Moustafa is a 19-year-old single Jordanian citizen who has been living and working in Lebanon for a year. He owns a grocery store where he sells special high quality goods with encouraging prices.

Moustafa used to work as a carpenter, but he turned to a daily income business, which he prefers, to develop and expand it in a well managed way.

Moustafa is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to buy a Renault rapid car which he will use to expand his business in a well managed way that will help him start a wholesale trade, and increase his business income. This car will help him transport his goods easily from the market to his shop.

He hopes that one day he'll be capable of buying his own shop, instead of paying rent, and in expanding his working sector.

loans.use: To buy a Renault rapid car to expand his business

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 40-year-old, married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She is a mother of five children. She has been engaged in fishing. She has sold fish for more than five years now. Her husband works as a fisherman. 

Alma is requesting a loan to buy fuel and spare parts for the fishing boat. The loan would allow her husband to enhance his daily catch, thus increasing their sales in the market. 

In the future, Alma would like to expand their business, so that it will augment their revenue enough to meet the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy fuel and spare parts for the fishing boat.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a married woman and a mother of  two grown children, from Talibon, Bohol. To earn a living, she does farming and grows and sells rice. Imelda works hard to support her husband in tilling their farm.

Imelda is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor cost for the farm. With this loan, she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm, thus augmenting her yield and income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor cost for the farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oil, beans and flour

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
San Jose están en el 3er ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas tienen la esperanza de poder ayudar a sus familias y por medio de ello poder superarse y ayudar a sus familias y sus seres queridos, ellas también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde la Sra. Vilma, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con ingresos bajos, por lo que debe esforzarse un poco más.
Está tratando de mejorar por medio de su trabajo, que consiste en la venta de prendas variadas que ella misma vende de manera ambulante, y por medio de ese trabajo tiene los ingresos para procurar dar a su familia un futuro mejor.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas, en especial de verano, ya que así podrá surtirse, a la vez que sigue con sus ventas.
texts.en:
San Jose is in the third cycle of the women’s communal bank program. All the women in the program hope to be able to help their families. Through the program, they hope to be able to do better and to help their families and loved ones. The women also form part of the program to eliminate poverty. Mrs. Vilma showed a level of poverty within level one in her survey, which means she has low income and has to work hard.

Mrs. Vilma is trying to improve her means of work which consists of selling various clothing. She sells it herself as a street vendor. This work provides the income to give her family a better future. 

Mrs. Vilma is requesting this loan to be able to buy clothing, especially summer clothing, so she will be able to have more stock and continue her sales.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Una Buena Esperanza  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Una Buena Esperanza es un grupo de crédito que esta formado por 6 mujeres quienes son amigas y comparten los mismos anhelos y objetivos que son mejorar la estabilidad de sus hogares, salir adelante y ofrecerles a sus hijos un mejor futuro. Se dedican a la crianza de animales y a la agricultura, aún mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que goza de bellos paisajes y verdes campos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mariana,  tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 14, 5 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija está en el colegio y su segunda hija se encuentra en la escuela, su esposo labora como carpintero, la casa en la que viven es propia. 
Doña Mariana es una mujer que se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a la venta de cosméticos, sus ventas las realiza recorriendo la ciudad, también se dedica a la crianza de animales como cuyes, cerdos y pollos, cultiva su terreno y lo que cosecha es para su casa y si existe un sobrante lo vende. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos y pollos. Su meta e terminar su casa.
texts.en:
‘Una Buena Esperanza’ is a credit group formed by six women who are friends who share the same dreams and goals.  These are to be able to improve the financial stability of their household, get along in life and provide their children with a better future.  They dedicate their time to raising animals and to agriculture, while still maintaining the culture and traditions of their villages.  They live around the Parish of Valle en Cuenca, an area which has beautiful countryside and green fields.

One of the members is Mariana, 33, who is married and has three children to this marriage, aged 14, 5 and 2.  Her first daughter is at high school and her second daughter is at primary school.  Her husband is a carpenter and they live in their own house.

Mariana takes care of the household chores and sells cosmetics.  She sells these all around the city.  She also raises animals such as guinea pigs, pigs and chickens.  She cultivates her own land and what she harvests is for her home and if any is left over then she sells it.

The loan she is asking for is to buy cosmetics and chickens.  Her goal is to finish her house.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and chickens.

loans.name: Estefanía

texts.es:
Estefanía es una joven emprendedora y activa de 22 años de edad, que, luego de culminar sus estudios secundarios se dedicó a buscar empleo para generar ingresos, pero por la inexperiencia laboral y por no tener estudios universitarios le fue imposible emplearse; por ello, hace aproximadamente 3 meses comenzó su propio negocio, vendiendo comidas rápidas en el sector donde reside, trabaja sola todos los días de 3 a 8 pm; así ha logrado generar los recursos necesarios para aportar a la economía del hogar.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (panes, carnes frías, salsas, desechables, gaseosas, entre otros) y realizar mejoras locativas (arreglar la cocina), esto le permitirá tener disponibilidad de insumos para atender la demanda actual de su negocio, además podrá cumplir con las exigencias de sanidad y evitará sanciones futuras; así acreditará poco a poco su negocio y podrá dar una mejor imagen al establecimiento, lo que llamará la atención de los transeúntes.
Estefanía, con su espíritu de superación y su empuje, tiene como propósito principal para un futuro cercano, poder organizar mejor su negocio, fortalecerlo y posicionarlo en el mercado, ofreciendo más variedad de alimentos y así tener mayor rentabilidad para mejorar las condiciones de vida y bienestar en su familia.
texts.en:
Estefanía is an enterprising and energetic young woman of 22, who after finishing her high school studies dedicated herself to seeking employment in order to generate income. But because of lack of work experience, and not having a university education, it was impossible for her to find work. For this reason, approximately three years ago she started her business, selling fast food in the area where she lives. 

She works every day from 3:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m, and this way has managed to generate the necessary resources to contribute to the household finances. For the purpose of building up her business, she is requesting the help of the loan to buy supplies at wholesale (bread, cold cuts, sauces, disposables, soft drinks and other items) and undertake site improvements (fix the stove). This will allow her to have supplies available for meeting her business's current demand. In addition she will be able to meet health requirements and avoid future penalties. She will formalize her business little by little and be able to give it a better appearance, which will  attract the attention of passersby. 

Estefanía, with her spirit of self-improvement and her drive has as her main goal for the near future to better organize her business. She wants to build it up and position it in the market, offering a greater variety of food, and having greater profitability so that she can improve her family's living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: To buy stock at wholesale (bread, cold cuts, sauces, disposables, soft drinks and other items) and undertake site improvements (fix the stove).

loans.name: Sandra Yaneth

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer campesina de 38 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con el fruto de su trabajo.
Desde muy joven aprendió a realizar todas las labores agropecuarias ya que ha sido una tradición familiar que pasa de generación en generación; gracias a ello, hoy en día se dedica a trabajar en su negocio independiente como productora de leche, posee 10 vacas a las cuales ordeña diariamente y la producción es vendida a un vecino que posee tanques de frío y a diferentes tiendas y cafeterías del municipio; esto le ha generado ingresos para apoyar a su esposo a solventar los gastos familiares.
La cliente se ha caracterizado por su empuje, perseverancia y por ser una luchadora incansable; ha sobrepasado diversos obstáculos ocasionados por los altos insumos agrícolas y por la inestabilidad en el precio de venta de su producto; sin embargo ha sabido manejar estas situaciones de dificultad y ha salido adelante motivada por el amor de su familia.
Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca productora de leche, con la que podrá reemplazar una que está en estado de gestación y no produce la misma cantidad de líquido; esto le permitirá cumplir con los contratos que posee y así mejorar las ventas e ingresos; que le abrirán paso para seguir luchando y fortalecer más su negocio, pues Sandra se proyecta ampliando su capacidad de producción con más animales en un futuro a mediano plazo; así tendrá la posibilidad de seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia y brindar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra, 38, is a farmer. She is married and has two children, who she has moved forward with her hard work.

From a young age, she learned farming skills since this is a family tradition passed down from generation to generation. Because of this, she now has an independent business as a milk producer. She owns 10 cows who she milks daily. The milk they produce is sold to a neighbor who has refrigerated tanks and to stores and cafes in town. This earns income to support her husband and pay family expenses.

Sandra is known for her drive, her perseverance, and her constant hard work. She has overcome obstacles from farming supplies and the unstable prices of the product she sells. However, she's been able to handle these difficult situations and move forward, motivated by her family's love.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy a cow for milking, which will replace one that is pregnant and doesn't produce as much milk. This will allow her to fulfill her contracts and improve her sales and income. This will allow her to keep working to strengthen her business. Sandra plans to grow her production capacity with more animals in the near future. Then she will be able to continue helping her family and bring them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow for milking.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing, footwear, and personal care products.

loans.name: Rac

texts.en:
Rac has a butcher shop. He is 51 years old and married with two children. He lives with his family in the Abseron region. One of his children studies at a university while another goes to high school. For the past 21 years, his family has lived as internally displaced persons in their native land of Fuzuli. 

Rac has applied to Komak for a loan in the amount of 2,100 AZN. With this loan, he wants to buy a new refrigerator. It should be noted that this is his second loan. Previously, he took a loan from Kiva and successfully paid it off. Rac is thankful to Kiva lenders for their help. In the future, he wants to improve his butcher shop.

loans.use: to buy a new refrigerator.

loans.name: Ruiz

texts.es:
Ruiz Loaiza, tiene 27 años actualmente se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Administración de redes informáticas en la Universidad Sise, su carrera consta de 5 años y se encuentra en el primer año de su carrera. 
El trabaja en la misma universidad y recibe el apoyo de su Centro de Estudio para que pueda hacer sus horas académicas realizando sus prácticas pre-profesionales, el puesto que ocupa es de Control Administrativo; dedica 28 horas semanales para sus estudios y se siente muy entusiasmado de haber comenzado una nueva etapa en su vida y se impulsa cada día a aprender y a seguir adelante con sus metas y convertirse en un gran profesional.
Su meta a un futuro es poner su propia empresa de Base de datos y seguir con sus proyectos a largo plazo para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
Su anhelo más grande de Ruiz Loaiza es poder terminar su carrera satisfactoriamente y sacar su título universitario; el préstamo solicitado será utilizado para implementar su centro de estudios y así pueda desenvolverse mejor y de manera más práctica.
A la vez nos da su aporte de reconocimiento ya que se siente satisfecho y agradecido con las personas de otro País que aportan ayuda a las personas que más necesitan.
texts.en:
Ruiz Loaiza is 27 years old. He is currently studying toward a degree in Network Administration at Sise University. He is in the first year of this five-year degree program.

He also works at the university and receives the support of his department so that he can earn academic hours by doing his pre-professional internship. The post he holds is Auditor; he works 28 hours a week for his studies, and he feels very excited to have begun a new stage of his life. He pushes himself every day to learn, progress toward his goals, and become a great professional.

His goal for the future is to start his own database business and to continue with his long-term plan to provide for his family. His biggest dream is to be able to complete his degree satisfactorily and earn his university diploma. The loan he has requested will be used to equip his study area so that he can manage better and more efficiently.

He also expresses his appreciation, as he feels satisfied and grateful to the people from other countries who contribute their support to those who need it most.

loans.use: to buy materials for his studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase iron and sheets

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
Cecilio, necesita invertir en la compra de concentrado para ganado, pues se está preparando para la época de verano y así tendrá el alimento necesario para mantener saludable y en óptimas condiciones el ganado.
El crédito anterior le permitió fortalecer el negocio, tener mejores ingresos con los que ha podido mejorar las condiciones familiares y adquirió un molino de nixtamal, con lo que tiene ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Cecilio needs to invest in the purchase of feed for cattle. He is preparing for summer, so he wants to have the necessary food to keep his cattle healthy and in good condition.

His previous loan allowed him to strengthen his business and improve his earnings, with which he was able to improve his family's living conditions and purchase a corn mill so that he can have extra income.

loans.use: to purchase feed for cattle.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 5 y 10 años de edad, con el objetivo de dar una mejor alimentación, vestuario, educación y salud, a su familia, se dedica atender su negocio de granos básicos y ganadería, o hace junto a su familia, en un horario de 6:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., su ventaja es que dispone de tierras propias para realizar estas actividades.
Invertirá en la compra de concentrado para ganado y la recolección de la cosecha, estará preparada para la época de verano, su cosecha será recolectada en menor tiempo. Espera fortalecer el negocio y aumentar sus ingresos con los que cancelara sus cuotas.
Sueña con continuar trabajando para dar a sus un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Carmen is married and has two children, ages 5 and 10. With the goal of providing better food, clothing, education, and health for her family, she tends to her business of selling staple grains and ranching. She sometimes works with her family. She works from 6:00 am until 3:00 pm. Her advantage is that she has her own land on which to perform these activities.

She will invest in the purchase of feed for cattle and collecting the harvest. She will be prepared for the summer season and her harvest will be collected in a short period of time. 

She hopes to strengthen her business and increase her income so that she can absolve her debts. She dreams of continuing to work to give her family a better future.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed and gather the harvest.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María, se ha decidido por otro crédito para comprar dos cerdos y alimento para cerdos como para las aves de corral, tendrá un inventario más fortalecido que le permitirá aprovechar la época de fin de año.
El préstamo anterior le ha dado la oportunidad mejorar las condiciones en que vivía su familia, pues ha tenido buenos ingresos ya que su negocio es más competitivo.
texts.en:
María has decided to take another loan to purchase two pigs and feed for her pigs and barnyard birds. She will be able to have a stronger inventory that will allow her to take advantage of the end of the year.

Her previous loan gave her the opportunity to improve her family's living conditions since she had more income because her business was more competitive.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 37 years old. He is a hardworking client from Iraq who lives with his parents and two brothers. He helps his parents by providing the family's income. 

Ali owns a barber shop. After working for several years as an employee at a barber shop, he gained enough experience to establish his own business, which he did in 2005. His dynamism and creativity have given him a good reputation. 

Ali is requesting a loan of $3,000. This loan will be used to renovate his barber shop. With this loan, Ali is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits to improve his and his parents' current financial situations.

loans.use: to renovate his barber shop.

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling vegetables for many years with her husband (who is also shown in the photo). She is very enthusiastic about her business of selling vegetables and manages to earn a reasonable amount of money to support her family. She is a loving mother of four children and is responsible for their food, health and education. 

For the improvement of her business, Irshad contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase sacks of onions and potatoes as well as some ginger. This will help her to meet market demand consistently. She is in her eighth loan cycle and has a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of onions and potatoes as well as some ginger.

loans.name: Ofelia Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ofelia, surtirá el inventario de su negocio de venta de pupusas y meriendas, comprara chicharrón, quesillo, aceite, carnes, embutidos, etc., con lo que contara con lo necesario y podrá continuar trabajando y teniendo más clientes satisfechos.
EL capital anterior le ayudo a surtir el negocio, tener más ingresos, cancelar sus deudas y cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Ofelia will stock the inventory of her business, where she sells pupusas and lunches. She will purchase pork rinds, cheese, oil, meat, sausages, etc., which will allow her to have the necessities to continue working and attracting more satisfied customers.

The previous loan helped her to stock her business, earn more income, pay her debts, and cover household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase pork rinds, cheese, oil, meat, sausages, etc.

loans.name: Kareema

texts.en: Kareema is a conservative woman, so she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Kareema's husband has been running his own shoe workshop for 14 years now. His job is their only source of income. He needs to expand it by buying a larger quantity of the required materials to make shoes, in order to raise his productivity and profit to cover their children needs as well as to provide them with the best education. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, Kareema decided to help him by applying for this loan.

loans.use: to buy required materials for making more shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy the fixed assets (shampoo bowls, styling chairs, curling irons, and blow dryers).

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, es jefa de su hogar, es madre soltera de una hija, desde hace cuatro años inicio por su cuenta la venta de ropa, en sus inicios no tenía mucha mercadería pero poco a poco ha ido surtiendo su inventario hoy en día ofrece una amplia gama de ropa y otros artículos de uso personal.
Comprará blusas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas, faldas y ropa interior ambos sexos, con lo que espera sacar el mayor provecho en esta temporada de fin de año y atraer nuevos clientes, para que de esa forma sus ingresos aumenten y poder cumplir con sus compromisos.
Sueña con mejorar el local donde tiene su negocio y en un futuro construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
María is the head of her household. She is a single mother with one daughter. Four years ago, she started her own business selling clothing. In the beginning, she did not have a lot of merchandise but, little by little, she increased her inventory. Today, she offers a wide variety of clothing and other personal use items. 

She will purchase blouses, pants, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, and underwear for men and women. She hopes to increase her profits at the end of the year and attract new customers so that her income increases and she can fulfill her promises.

She dreams of improving the location of her store and, in the future, building her own home.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, pants, dresses, t-shirts, skirts, and underwear for men and women.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in agriculture as his main source of income though he earns a monthly salary as his side income. He started this business to educate his children and sustain his family. He faces a challenge of climatic changes that affect his crops. He hopes to have educated children in future.

He is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more products for his store to resell

loans.name: Raymunda

texts.en:
Raymunda is a married woman from Getafe, Bohol. She has four children. She is engaged in a furniture-making business.

She makes furniture made of wood like tables and chairs with her husband. She has been in furniture making for more than 10 years. Aside from the furniture business, she grows rice for additional earnings.

As of now, Raymunda needs a loan for her business. She is asking for a loan to buy wood for furniture and fertilizer for her farm. Through this, she will be able to improve her businesses and augment her income.

loans.use: to buy wood for furniture and fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Alegres es un grupo relativamente nuevo, donde todas están empezando a trabajar juntas y también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan por sus familias y para poder mantener sus hogares.
Una de las integrantes es la Honorina, quien además de ser la presidenta de este grupo, también está dedicándose a la venta de frutas varias, y es en esta época que más ventas tiene, es por eso que solicita de este préstamo, para comprar más tipo de frutas, para poder surtirse y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes, a la vez que tiene los ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Mujeres Alegres is a relatively new group, where all the women are starting to work together and are completing the poverty survey. The women are the heads of their families. They fight for their families and to be able to maintain their homes.

One of the group's members is Honorina. Besides being the president of this group, she also sells various fruit. At this time she has the most sales, and that is why she is applying for this loan. She wants to buy more kinds of fruit, to be able to stock her business, and meet her customer's demands. This will allow her to have the income to be able to help her family.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruits to sell.

loans.name: William Alexander

texts.es:
William, solicita un nuevo crédito para equipar su negocio comprara repuestos para computadoras y accesorios, para dar mejor un mejor servicio  a sus clientes y continuar saliendo a adelante con su familia.
Con el crédito anterior su negocio se fortaleció y le permitió tener mayores ganancias con las que cancelo las cuotas de la deuda adquirida. Su familia ha aumentado pues ha nacido su hijo, y manifiesta que gracias a las nuevas condiciones económicas que hoy tiene puede dar un estilo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
William is requesting a new loan to equip his business. He will buy replacement parts and accessories for computers to give his customers better service and to continue providing for his family.

The previous loan strengthened his business and allowed him to have better earnings, which he used to pay off the debt he had acquired. His family has grown with the birth of his son, and he expresses his thanks for the new economic conditions that he now has; he can give a better standard of living to his family.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and accessories for computers.

loans.name: Nery De Jesús

texts.es:
Nery, es una mujer de 44 años de edad, madre de dos hijos y vive en unión libre con su compañero sentimental.
Durante su vida productiva trabajó por 10 años en diferentes tiendas y cafeterías de la ciudad, donde obtuvo experiencia y conocimiento en el manejo de este tipo de negocios; esto la impulsó a tomar la decisión de independizarse y montar su propia tienda de abarrotes, la cual se encuentra ubicada en la casa donde reside; allí trabaja sola todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana y ya lleva 6 meses generando ingresos para su hogar.
