She also engages in the fishing business as her second business. As of now, Lucia is asking for a loan to buy animal feed for the pigs and new fishing nets for fishing. With this, she will be able to improve her business thus augmenting her income.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for the pigs and new fishing nets for fishing

loans.name: Romulo

texts.en:
Romulo is a food vendor from the town of Loon, Bohol. He is a 51-year-old married man. Romulo has been engaged in the food vending business for more than ten years now. He sells home cooked snack foods to the people in his place.

Romulo is asking for a loan to buy additional ingredients like flour, sugar, milk, butter, cooking oil and others. Through this, he will be able to cook and sell more, thus augmenting his sales and income.

In the future, Romulo hopes to make his business a success.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like flour, sugar, milk, butter, cooking oil and others

loans.name: Savoeun

texts.en:
A married mother of two dependent children, Savoeun is 37 years old and lives in Bakan district, Pursat province. She has been managing an agricultural business growing rice to earn a living for nearly 20 years. She has around one hectare and a half of farmland and she grows her rice crops twice a year. Her earnings are a big help for the family's daily needs and the education of her children

As this will be her first loan with HKL, she aims to build a proper latrine for her family as her old one is not comfortable and hygienic enough to use any more. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Savoeun is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a proper latrine for her family.

loans.name: Adulfa

texts.en:
Adulfa is a married woman from Loon, Bohol, and the mother of four grown up children. She has been engaged in the fishing business with her husband for more than 30 years now.

Adulfa is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market. In the future, Adulfa hopes to make their fishing business a success.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and others

loans.name: Ariunbold

texts.en: Ariunbold, 29 years old, lives with his wife and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a driver at a private firm since 2012. His wife is employed full time so their children are looked after by him and his wife. He is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to buy a natural gas vehicle. The automobile will be used to deliver his wife and children to their work and grandparents' home respectively. Also a natural gas vehicle has the benefit of emitting less smoke and wastes less fuel compared to other engines. Buying this environmentally friendly car should be encouraged everywhere.

loans.use: to buy a natural gas vehicle

loans.name: Dúo Gardenias De Peronia Group

texts.es:
DUO GARDENIAS DE PERONIA
La  señora shery  julissa quien es propietaria de una farmacia la cual acaba de hacerse acreedora  hace algunos meses y quien también es madre de una niña  es una persona la cual esta my deseosa de convertirse en una mujer microempresaria dentro de su comunidad ella es una mujer la cual lucha día con día para poder ayudar y brindar un buen estilo de vida a su familia menciona que hace algunos meses se le dio a oportunidad de poder  poner un local en el cual su variedad de medicina ayudaría a las personas que están dentro de su comunidad actualmente trata la manera de mantener lo  básico que se necesita en una farmacia pero ella espera con  la ayuda de DIOS poder surtirla aun mas y es por eso que en esta ocasión la señora shery toca las puertas de la fundación para poder solicitar de ustedes un crédito en el cual ella desea poder surtir en su variedad toda clase  de medicina y con ello poder contribuir con el desarrollo de su familia y ser un apoyo importante y económico de su familia.
texts.en: Shery Julissa became the owner on credit of a pharmacy several months ago.  She is also the mother of a daughter, and a person who wants very much to become an entrepreneurial woman in her community.  She is a woman who strives every day to help and to provide a good standard of living for her family.  A few months ago she was given the opportunity to provide a business to her community that will help people by offering them a variety of medicines.  She is trying to maintain the basic stock necessary for a pharmacy, but is hoping that with God's help she will be able to supply her business even better.  For this reason she is knocking on the foundation's door to request a loan from you, which she hopes to use to stock her business with all kinds of medicines.  In this way she will be able to contribute to the development of her family and to be an important economic support for her family.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical medicines to sell.

loans.name: Istiqomah

texts.en: Istiqomah is from Java and has lived in Bali for about four years. She is married and has two children, one adult and one still in school. Her husband works as a laborer. They rent a room to live to live in. To earn income, she has a small kiosk in front of her room and sells daily needs for families, such as rice, oil, soap, kitchen needs, etc. She has been in this business for two years. Istiqomah is seeking a loan of 2.000.000 IDR from MUK to expand her business. With the loan, she will purchase more snacks to stock in her kiosk and also pay the rent of her room. With her earnings, she hopes to be able to pay school fees for her child and fulfill the family's needs.

loans.use: To purchase more snacks to stock in her kiosk and also pay the rent of her room

loans.name: Uwezo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Nyabendo est une commerçante depuis 10 ans et membre d’un collectif d’affaires « Uwezo ». âgée de 43 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants qui tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse souliers usagés. Elle étale ses business sur la rue dans un quartier animé. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 15 paires de souliers. Son conjoint est un commissionnaire. Elle avait débuté avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite reconstruire sa maison calcinée, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour avoir bien choisi sa cible, en apportant un soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs exclues du système bancaire classique, tout en leur accordant des crédits sans garantie matérielle, surtout, pendant, la période post conflit dans la région de l’Est Pays.
texts.en:
The borrower, Nyabendo, has been a retailer for 10 years; she is member of a business group called Uwezo. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of two children who are both in school. She sells used shoes. She displays her goods in the street of a busy neighborhood. 
She is requesting a loan from Hekima to increase her activity. She will buy 15 pairs of shoes.

Her husband is a broker. She started her business with funds received from her husband. In the future, she wishes to rebuild her burned down home, send her children to school and feed them.
She is grateful to Hekima for having targeted women and supporting women entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system, by offering them loans without collateral. This is particularly important during the post conflict period in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 15 pairs of shoes

loans.name: Jose

texts.en: Jose is aged 48. He is engaged in retailing. He wants to lift his family out of poverty and that's why he's devoted himself to his business. At this time, he wants to improve his business. In this regard, he is taking out this loan amounting to PHP 9,000 to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, curls, beverages and condiments to sell. He's hoping that his business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, curls, beverages and condiments.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more grocery items for her variety store. Aside from her variety store, she also has an apartment for additional income. Her income from business is assisting her everyday expenses. She continues to work to provide for her daily needs.
 
She would like to apply for another 27,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Evangeline hopes that her business will grow bigger and dreams to help others who are in need. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and she also draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God that she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Santos Yllermo

texts.es:
Santos Yllermo tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y res menores hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una ciudad de clima caluroso, su población se dedican a la agricultura de frutas, café, arroz entre otros y comercio de los mismos, también se dedican a la ganadería, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, ubicado a en la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura cultivando piña, maíz y cafeto especialmente, con una experiencia en el rubro de 8 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fitosanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha y de esta manera lo ayudara a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cual no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.
texts.en: Santos Yllermo is 39 years old and lives with his wife and three minor children in the Pucara district, two hours from the city of Jaen, which is located in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.  It is a city with a warm climate where the population works growing fruit, coffee, rice and other things and selling them.  They also raise livestock.  Santos works in agriculture, growing pineapple, corn and coffee especially, and has been doing this for 8 years.  He is requesting a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to apply pesticides and fertilizers and to pay laborers to harvest his crop.  This will help him to ensure a good, healthy crop, and thus have better production and a better quality product, and to avoid having problems selling his product.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to maintain his crop.

loans.name: Karanjung Indah Group

texts.en:
The group makes their payments. During the loan periods, they can manage the business well. Maintaining pigs for fattening, they sell them together to a big buyer.

Ni Komang is very happy because her pigs grow healthy and the weight is reached. She sold all of them. She kept them for six months and sold to other breeders in her village. All the profit is used for capital for her pig business.

With the same members, the Karanjung Indah group is receiving a new loan. To increase the business, the group asked for the same loan size. The group is receiving 35,000,000 IDR and each member receives 3,500,000 IDR. The loan will be used to purchase piglets, feed and renovate the cages.

Ni Komang will use her loan to purchase feed and renovate the cage. Now she has a sow and she hopes the sow can give birth soon. To prepare for it, she will buy good quality feed and widen the cage. She hopes the planning will go well and she can be a piglet seller in her village.

loans.use: to purchase feed and renovate the cage.
